item.text: @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrA TA kAr+Na ba ta n+h+ra maN+Tal tsa kra Sh+ya sA d+ha nar t+na pad+ma rA ga ni d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs pad+ma rA ga'i
gter zhes bya ba/ dpal bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /thugs rjes kun bsdus ngo bo'i sku/ /dngos grub gcig bsdus rang bzhin
te/ /rgyud kyi phyag can lhan skyes zhal/ /gnyis med shes rab phag mo dang / /lhan cig bzhugs pa de la 'dud/ /mkhyen pa'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /snod ldan blo mun sel mdzad cing / /
don gyi bdud rtsis tshim mdzad ba/ /mtsho skyes la sogs bla ma'i tshogs/ /zla ba lta bu rnams la 'dud/ /dpal ldan mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho yi/ /bla ma'i man ngag mngon rtogs rim/ /ji bzhin rtogs

pa'i nus med kyang / /bdag nyid dran phyir bri bar bya/ /de la thog mar dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dpar bskur ba'i rim pas dag par byas pa zab pa dang rgya che ba la lhag par mos pas rgyud kyi don khong du chud

pa'i sgrub pa pos/ skye bo med pa'i sa phyogs dang / ri bo dang / ri'i phug dang / bya skyibs dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang / gdod ma nas grub pa'i dur khrod dang / gang du yid dga' ba'i gnas su yang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

ras ris dang / gtor ma dang / mchod yon la sogs pa'i nye bar spyod pa rnams dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan gyi gnas bstar ba/ bdud rtsis gtor zhing / me tog gcal du bkram pas dga' bar byas par/ tho rengs sad pa dang rdo rje rnal 'byor ma

rnams kyis glu dang cang te'u'i sgras bskul bar bsams te/ gdong gi gtsang sbra la sogs byas nas/ ro dngos kyi steng ngam mi'i pags pa la sna tshogs rdo rje bris pa'i steng du/ gcer bu khar bdud rtsi'i ri lu bcug pa lhor mngon par

phyogs pas/ rdo rje'i skyil krung la sogs pas 'dug ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i dbus dang mthe'u chung nas bzung ba'i sor mo rnams kyi rtsa ba la/ dpal mo'i go cha rnams kyis sbyang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi go cha yang dbus dang sor mo

rnams kyi rtse mo la dgod do/ /de nas pad+ma'i snod du myos byed bzang pos bkang la lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste g.yon pa'i srin lag gis chos 'byung gi ri mo bya zhing / yi ge gsum brjod pas bdud rtsir bsams te/ de

nyid kyi mthe bong dang srin lag sbyar bas chang gtor te yan lag lnga la khrus dang / mthor 'thung dang / mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la bsang gtor yang bya'o/ /de nas rang gi mdun du chang de nyid dang / dri zhim po bsres pas maN+Dal gru bzhi par byugs te me tog sil

mas gtor la rdo rje phyag rgyas reg cing b+hur b+hu wa swaHzhes brjod pas sa 'og dang / sa steng dang / mtho ris kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas oM AHs+thA nAM mer k+Sha hUM zhes brjod cing me tog gcig rang gi 'og tu bzhag bas gnas bsrung bar bya'o/ /a AHa+wat+mA nA me

rak+Sha hUM zhes bya ba dang / me tog gcig rang gi mgo bor bzhag ste bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/ /'khyud pa'i phyag rgya dang oM AHyo gAM mer k+Sha hUM zhes bya bas rnal 'byor bsrung bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su sems can 'khor ba sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor bying ba rnams phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang

la gzhag pa'i phyir bdag gis dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bsgom par bya'o zhes sems bskyed do/ /de nas tha mal pa'i lus nyid la/ dpa' bo'i go cha'i sngags brjod cing gnas de dang der rdo rje'i phyag rgya reg bas go cha bya'o/ /de nas me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar la

dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los sgyur/ /ye shes lnga dang sku gsum ste/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam par rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing / /'jig rten bya ba rab 'jug ma/ /de snyed rnams la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i

rgya mtshor yongs bying ba/ /yang dag yongs su sgrol mkhas ba'i/ /bla ma dam pa'i drin gang gis/ /bdag la ye shes 'di skyed 'dud/ /cis bya bas mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams yid kyis gsal bar byas la me tog gtor zhing

phyag bya'o/ /de nas mchog nas bshad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la gtor ma dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas bdag nyid skad cig gis bde mchog zhal bzhi phyag bcu gnyis pa sku mdog sngon po phag mo dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni lus dag par byed pa'o/ /rang gi snying gar

paM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ de'i steng du ra~M yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / de'i steng du yi ge hU~M kha dog nag po ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'phro bzhin pa bsams la/ ngag tu thog mar oM

dang mthar hUM hUM phaT dang ldan pa'i A li kA li brjod pas hUM gi nA da las yi ge'i phreng ba kha dog sna tshogs 'phro bzhin pa bton te g.yon gyi lus kyi stod du sngon po dang bar du dmar po dang / smad du dkar po'i phreng bas dkris te de dag las khams gsum gyi regs su gtogs pa'i

lha'i tshogs rim bzhin du stod dang / bar dang / smad rnams las gzugs med pa dang gzugs dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi ris rnams spros te khams gsum gyi bgegs rnams med par byas nas/ rang rang gi gnas su bsdu ba ni/ ngag dug par byed pa'o/ /de nas spyi bo dang /

dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga'i thad kyi nam mkha' la shrI he ru ka'i yi ge bzhi kha dog sngon po bsams la de rnams kyi don dran par bya ste/ de yang shrI yig 'byung ba kun gyi don/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni/ /'jug med

bde ba'i mtha' can gang / e waM la sogs gnyis med pa'ang / /shrI zhes bya ba'i yig des brjod/ /he yig snying gnas kun du/ /he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro/ /bsgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las/ /'dzin pa la sogs rnams bskyed 'gyur/ /da ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de/ /

rgyu yi bdag nyid mi rtog pa'o/ /rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid/ /de ni stong ba'i rnal 'byor gnas/ /bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa/ /rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni/ /rgyu yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/ /de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o/ /slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i/ /bdag

gis gnyis byar med shes gang / /gang phyir ci la'ang mi gnas pa/ /de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod/ ces bya ba dang / dngos po mngon sum stong pa min/ /dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can/ /dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo/ /snga nas sgo kun 'gro ba'o/ /zhes bya ba brjod cing don dran par

bya ba ni yid dag par byed pa'o/ /de nas phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams lha'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gzugs kyi phung po ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /tshor ba'i phung po ni rdo rje nyi ma'o/ 'du shes kyi phung po ni pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/ /'du byed kyi phung po ni rdo rje

rgyal bo'o/ /rnams par shes pa'i phung po ni rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni shrI he ru ka rdo rje'o/ /mig dag ni gti mug rdo rje'o/ /nyan pa dag ni zhe sdang rdo rje'o/ /sna dang ni phrag dog rdo rje'o/ /kha dag ni 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /

reg ni ser sna rdo rje'o/ /skye mched thams cad ni dbang phyug rdo rje'o/ /sa'i khams ni ltung bar byed ma'o/ /chu'i khams ni gsod ma'o/ /me'i khams ni 'gugs ma'o/ /rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma 'bar ma'o/ /de

rnams kyang slob dpon shes rab bsrungs kyis bkod pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o/ /de nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong brdabs pa sngon du 'gro bas/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha kA yi kaM hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na bA tsiM kAM hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya tsi tA kaM tsa ra si maM

hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga wAn badzra ni kaM hUM hUM phaT ces bya ba brjod pas snying ga'i hUM las kha dog nag po dang / ljang gu dang / dmar po dang / ser po'i mdog can rnams te tshangs pa'i mtha' nas 'og gser gyi sa gzhi la thug gi bar du sngags kyi gzugs chen po shar

dang byang dang nub dang lho'i phyogs rnams su kha phyir phyogs pa rim pas spros pa dgod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi 'og char ram yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM sngon po yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu chen po gser gyi sa gzhi la thug pa/ hUM gis

byin gyis brlabs pa bsam la/ de'i 'od zer dang suM b+ha la sogs pa'i sngags kyi 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi ra ba gru gzhi pa kha dog sngar dang mthun pa dang / rdo rje dang hUM gi 'od zer rnams kyi steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa ljang gu'i mda'i dra ba dang / de'i 'og tu rdo rje'i

gur dang bla re yang bsam par bya'o/ /de nas suMb+ha la sogs pa'i sngags bzhi las grub pa'i kha'i gdong can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / oM dang hUM hUM phaT las grub pa'i gshin rje brtan ma la sogs pa bzhi bo rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma

phyag g.yas pas rdo rje thob bsnams shing / g.yon pas rang 'dra ba'i lha mo lte ba man chad phur bu'i rnam pa can g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa thogs pa bsnams pa rnams la/ sarba bag+c+nIM A na ya dzaHzhes bya ba brjod pas/ phyogs mtshams su son pa'i bgegs

kyi tshogs rnams ra ba'i phyi rol du bkug pa'i dbus brgyad du/ hUM phyogs skyong gi kha dog dang mthun pa bsams te bgegs kyi tshogs rnams hUM la bsdus la/ de rnams gyur pa las phyogs skyong brgyad du bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas hUM gi sgra drag la ring ba bsgrags pas/ de

rnams rang rang gi mdun du me'i dong chen po dmigs te lha mo rnams kyis de rnams su bcug ste phur bus mgo bo nas gdab cing / oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sa rba pA paM phaT hUM hUM hUM badzra d+ha ra a dz+nyA pa ya ti bi g+haM kA ya bA katsi t+ta dzra kI

la ya hUM phaT/ ces bya ba lan gsum brjod pas mgrin pa dang snying gar yang gdab po/ /de nas oM badzra mung+ga ra badzra badzra kI lA ko Ta ya hUM phaT ces bya ba lan gsum brjod pas rdo rje tho bas brdungs te rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i srog dang bral nas gnyis su med pa'i ye shes

thor par bsam par bya ste/ lha mo rnams rab la thim pa dang / phyi nang rim pa bzhin me dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / 'khor lo'i ra ba zlum po ril bo gcig pa bsam par bya'o/ /'og gi hUM zhu ba las rdo rje phra mo rnams par med par gtams te/ bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad

kun nas bgegs dang bral ba'o zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ de nas snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis/ bla ma dang / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te sngar gyi maN+Dal gyi dbus su bzhugs par bya'o/ /de nas oM AHhUM zhes lan gsum brjod

pas bsang gtor bya'o/ /oM pra bar sad kAr pA d+yaM pra tI ts+tshaswU hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis zhabs la zhabs bsil dbul bar bya'o/ /oM pra bar sad kAr ar+g+haM pra tIts+tsha swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis lag pa g.yon pa mtha' nas phye ba'i phyag rgya mthe bong dang srin lag gis

me tog dung gi chu la btags pa lan gsum gyis zhabs la mchod yon dbul bar bya'o/ /de ltar rang rang gi sngags kyis maN+Dal du me tog dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas thams cad la oM AHbadzra puSh+be hUM/ oM AH badzra b+hU pe hI pe hUM/ a~M AH badzra gan+d+he hUM/ /

oM AHbadzra nai bi d+ye hUM/ zhes bya ba rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o/ /rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las spros pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo bcu drug rnams kyis slob dpon shes rab bsrungs kyi ltar mchod par bya'o/ /de nas rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i sngags kyis bdud rtsi dang bcas

pa'i chang dbul bar bya'o/ /kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/ /'gro don rab tu sgrub pa po/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'dir byung ba dang / dpal sdom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna tshogs yi shes chen pos g.yogs/ thams cad bdag nyid rtug tu bzhugs/ thugs rjes khro ba

drag chen po/ dpal sdom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya bus bstod par bya'o/ /bgyis dang bgyid stsal rjes su yi rangs la sogs sdig pa ma lus pa ni skyon rnams ma lus nges par bcom pa yis/ /mdun du so so bshags bya slar la yang ni mi byed pa yi

sdom gzung ba nyid du bya/ /nyan thos dang ni bse ru bla med rgyal ba rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyis bsags pa'i dge ba la/ /rjes su yi ni rang zhing chub yang dag yongs su bsngo bar bdag gis bya/ /rgyal ba rin chen la sogs gsum la ji snyed skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba

thams cad du ni bsgom/ /byang chub sems ni rnam par gzung ngo bla na med pa'i lam ni de bzhin bsten/ /des nas oM AH badzra muHhUM/ /zhes brjod pas gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas snying rje dang byams pa dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dran par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su oM sarbad+ha rmAH

shAn+ya swa b+hA wa shUn+yo ny+rahaM/ o~M sarbad+harmaHswa b+hA wa shu ng+d+ho \u0f85haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM yong shud+d+haH sarba d+harmA yog shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes bya ba brjod cing don dran par byas te chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil ltar bsgom par

bya'o/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyis sad pa'i sems nam mkha' la nA da la rim gyis rdzogs pa'i hUM blta'o/ /de dang dus mnyam du bsrung ba'i rab la sogs pa rnams kyang blta bar bya'o/ /de'i nang gi 'og gi char yaM sngon po yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon

po gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu mtha' gnyis na g.yo bzhin pa'i ba dan yaM gis byin gyis brlab bo/ /de'i steng du raM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba bzhin pa'i grwa can raM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de'i steng bu baM dkar po yongs

su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pa dang bcas pa la baM yig go/ /de'i steng du laM ser po yongs su gyur pa las/ sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po gru bzhi pa grwar rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang ldan pa laM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de'i steng du yi ge suM kha dog sna

tshogs pa yongs su gyur pa las rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin gyi ri rab zur bzhi ba rtse mo brgyad dang ldan pa suM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /de'i steng du baM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma de'i steng du hUM yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te/ /'byung ba rnams

zhu zhing sla ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas gcig du 'dres pas ri rab 'og tu ltung bas 'byung ba zhu ba'i gong bu sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du chags pa yongs su gyur pa las/ gzhal med khang sgo rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ dbus su ni chos kyi 'byung gnas gru gsum pa'i nang du'o/ /

gnyis pa gru bzhi pa la/ /gsum pa grwa lnga pa dang / bzhi par zur drug pa'i nang du ste/ mdog dmar po steng du bltas pa rnams so/ /dkyil 'khor gsum ni zlum po yin la kun gyi phyi ma ni gru bzhi ba ste/ kun kyang gzhal yas khang gi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa dur khrod dang

bcas pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor nang ma ni g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi rlung gnyis dbu mar 'jus pa'i rang bzhin gnag pa dang / /sngo ba'i rtsig pa gnyis pa'o/ /gnyis pa ni sku gsung thugs dag pa'i rang bzhin sngo ba dang dmar po dang dkar bo'i rtsig pa gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /

gsum pa ni dga' ba bzhi dag pa'i rang bzhin sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu'i ri mo bzhi dang ldan pa'o/ /kun gyi phyi rol ni ye shes lnga dag pa ste phyi rol du dkar po dang bcas pa'o/ /kun gyi dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa/

lte ba la nyi ma'i steng du 'jigs byed chen po dang dus kyi mtshan mo'o/ /de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rim pa gsum pa dang ldan pa/ /de'i phyi rol bskal pa bzang po'i snam bu dang bcas pa'o/ /phyi ma rnams la yang dus kyi pad+ma ma gtogs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i phyi rol nas nang gi phyi ma'i

'khor lo'i bar gyi mtshams rnams kyi phreng ba ni/ rim pa bzhin du gri gug dang rin po che dang rdo rje dang pad+ma dang 'khor lo dang ral gri dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang thod pa dang mgo bo dang keng rus dang zhags pa dang lcags kyu'i phreng ba rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs

rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug go/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs re re'i steng du'ang ro'i gdan re re'o/ /de bzhin du pad+ma'i 'dab ma lha'i gnas rnams dang sgo dang mtshams rnams su yang ngo / /lha'i gnas ma yin pa mtshams kyi pad+ma rnams la ni rin po che'i bum pa re re'o/ /'khor lo'i

kha dog rnams ni 'chad par 'gyur te/ de ltar rten gyi dkyil 'khor dmigs te rgyas par ni 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyis kyang shes par bya'o/ /de nas 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi steng gi chang A li nyis 'gyur g.yon skor las de'i gzugs brnyan dang ldan pa'i zla ba

bsgom pa na me long lta bu'o/ /de'i steng du kA li yar la waT D+ha dang bcas pa nyis 'gyur g.yon skor las de'i gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i nyi ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o/ /de gnyis kyi dbus su steng gi hUM zhugs te 'khor lo bcu gnyis kyi lha rnams spros te 'gro ba thams

cad re'i bdag nyid can du byas nas 'dus te de nyid du zhugs pas rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ba/ lte ba la hUM gis byin gyis brlabs pa ni so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin no/ /hUM las kyang 'od zer sna tshogs dpag tu med pa byung ste sngar lha nyid du bsgrubs pa ma lus pa

dang gdod ma nas grub pa thams cad bkug ste/ de nyid du gzhug pa 'di ni bya ba grub pa'o/ /de rnams thams cad yongs su gyur pa las rgyu'i he ru ka bskyed ba ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo ste de yang / skya mdog dkar po zhal bzhi ba/ /spyan gsum

phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shes rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /dkar dang ljang gu dmar po dang / /ser po g.yon nas bskor ba'o/ /zhal gyi ral pa'i cod pan la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/ /'phrog byed dka' mo mnyam par

mnan/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu glang chen gyi/ /bags pa cang te'u gri gug dang / /dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du/ /kha T+waM ga snod zhags pa dang / /mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas par ro/ /shes rab rang dang 'dra ba la/ /'on

kyang bud med mtshan nyid ldan/ /de nas de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gi sa bon blta bar bya ste 'di ni bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje mi dmigs pa las hUM sngon po las rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ba'o/ /yi ge byaM dmar ser las nor bu ste de nyid kyis

byin gyis brlabs pas/ /bu gar phaT ser po mgo phyir bstan pa'o/ /AHdmar po'i sa yuM gyi pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma gsum pa/ /d+yAM dkar ser las ze 'bru de nyid kyis mtshan pa/ bu gar phaT ser po mgo phyir bstan pa'o/ /de nas rig ma la rdo rje phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i

snying po dang bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po dang nye ba'i snying po rim pa ji lta bus lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa dang dpral bar bkod de tsu m+ban zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mas kyang / /de nyid kyi snying bo dang nye ba'i snying bo mgrin pa dang dpral dang dpral bar bkod de rang nyid kyi lte ba

dang snying gar bkod la tsum+ba na zhes bya'o/ /de nas yi ge gsum brjod cing dga' ba brtsam par bya ste/ /snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer dang rdo rje dang pad+ma'i dga' ba'i sgras phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul te/ /zhal du zhugs nas lha mo'i pad+mar babs

pa dang gnyis ka bde ba chen po lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor zhu bar gyur pa dngul chu'i rdog ma lta bu ste 'di ni nye ba'i bsnyen pa'o/ /de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi thig le de nyid las

'thon te rang rang gi gnas su pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams la 'dug nas bskul bar mdzad pa ste/ de yang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa drug gis mgrin gcig tu/ /mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba mgron 'bod na/ /khyod ni ci yi phyir na stong pa nyid du bzhugs/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs

shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bde chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod/ /lA ma la sogs pa rnams kyis/ /gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub/ /'jig rten phyugs gang shi ba bzhin du gyur/ /bdag gi pad+ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod/ /de ltar

'jig rten kun bder gyur par byos/ /ngum skyes ma la sogs pas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la rol cig rol/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa 'thob/ /sems can 'jig rten gzhan ni rmongs gyur pas/ /ji ltar khyod ni stong pa don med gyur/ /gzugs can ma la sogs

bas kyang / /khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste/ /ci phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin 'gro med bzhugs/ /bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod/ /ji ltar khyod ni 'jig rten rnam mthun bzhud/ /de nas de rnams thig le de nyid la zhugs par blta'o/ /de nas thig le de nyid yongs

su gyur pa las hUM gi yi ge sngon po'o/ /de las rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa lte bar hUM ljang sngon dang bcas ba'o/ de yongs su gyur pa las dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas bskang cig gis rdzogs par blta ba ni gsang sngags 'di 'don bzhin pa'o/ /de yang / glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba yis/ /

rang nyid he ru kar rab sad/ /oM AH kA ya b+da k+tsa t+ti badzra hUM phaT hoH/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'don ba na/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /skad cig sngags pas byung bdag nyid/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'jigs byed mchan mon ga mo

dang / /lte ba nyi ma me mchog la/ gar du mdzad pa yi ni sku/ /gnag dang ljang gu phyed phyed do/ /bdun cu rtsa drug phyag dang ni/ /zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum pa/ /dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /mche ba chen po gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /

g.yas dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni/ /ser ba dang ni ljang gur grags/ /nub ni dmar po de bzhin te/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par byed/ /rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya/ /glang chen

pags phyag gnyis kyis/ /skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang / /rtse gsum ji lta'i rim pas g.yas/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phub dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang / /dbyug to dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /

dung dang zangs dung dbyi gu dang / /rma bya'i mjug ma de bzhin du/ /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyig pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang / /rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang dum bus nya rgya/ /mgo med 'bar ba'i

mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon par dril bu phub rings mche/ /gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+waM ga pu ste/ /phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yeng ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /

b+ho kam rnga dang lpags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /ro bsreg bskul ba'i shing bu dang / /'phangs dang phub rings mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor ba de bzhin du/ /mig dang mkha' ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa dang ni phur bu dang / /sa bon gang ba sog le dang / /kha dang slud

bshus pags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu/ /phyag gi mtshon cha bdun cu gnyis/ /de lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /mgo bo lnga yis rgyan du byas/ /mgo bo lnga yis rgyan du byas/ /phyag rgya drug dang ldan pas klubs/ /de bzhin mgo brgya'i phreng ba dang / /dbu brgyan zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs

dang / /sku la ba spu'i phreng ba ldan/ /sku yi tshigs rnams thams cad la/ /shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan/ /sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar bas/ /rnam par 'phros bcas rnam bsgom bya/ /dbu rnams kun la dar dpyangs kyi/ /phreng ba brtul zhugs tsan gyi bya/ / zhes bya ba

ni gtso bo sgom pa ste 'di ni bsgrub pa'o// //de yi mdun du lha mo che/ /rdo rje phag mo mdog dmar mo/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug dang / sdigs mdzub phyogs rnams kun du mdzad/ /g.yon pas gdug pa'i khrag bkang

ba'i/ /thod bcas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud/ gcer bu spyan gsum skra grol ma/ /spyan gsum drag mo'i gzugs can ma/ /zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs ma ste/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa mo/ /sgeg pa'i rgyan rnams dang ni ldan/ /dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /yan

lag lha rdzas dris nyer byugs/ /zhabs gdub dpung rgyan rnams dang ldan/ /lha rdzas me tog phreng bas klubs/ /rtse phran zlar gnas rdo rje ni/ /dpral bar rtag tu 'dzin pa mo/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /'jig dus me lha'i 'od zer can/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs

mdun du/ /sku las 'bar ba'i phreng ba spro/ /zhes bya ba ni yum bsgom pa ste/ /sgrub pa chen po'o/ /dang po gnas dang / /bdag dang rnal 'byor bsrung ba la sogs pa nas 'di dag gi bar du ni/ /dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lus kyi rang bzhin can no/ /pad+ma'i

'dab ma shar sogs kyi/ /bar bar du mi rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs nyid ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug drug go/ /shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug de bzhin/ /dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar/ /slar yang lA ma la

sogs drug/ /nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar/ /dum skyes ma la sogs pa'i rigs/ /dang po lho nas shar gyi mtha'/ /de nas gzugs can ma sogs drug/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid/ /'o byed ma dang gzhan bsgyur ma/ /byis bcas

ma dang rjes 'jug ma/ /phyed nag phyed sngo can rnams so/ /lA ma rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / /bzang mo thod pa can nag mo/ /rgyal po bskor ma phyed ljang gu/ /gang phyir phyed dmar rim pas so/ /dum skyes ma dang dur khrod ma/ /rnam par zhu ma ku ru kul/ /glu ma gar mar

grags ma rnams/ /phyed dmar ba la phyed ser mo/ /gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug phud ma/ /thor tshugs ral pa can drag mo/ /lha mo phyed ser phyed nag mo/ /phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhin/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi snod rnams

so/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du/ /thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma/ /g.yon skor du ni shes bya ste/ /ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o/ /'di ni thig le'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// //de'i rgyab rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni/ /sngo nag 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams

kyis/ /g.yon skor rim pas bsam bya ba/ /shes rab thabs dang mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /de dag kyang mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o/ /lA ma dang sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'o/ /dum skyes ma dang pad+ma mkha' 'gro'o/ /gzugs can ma dang rin chen mkha'

'gro'o/ /rab tu gtum mo dang thod pa'i dum bu can no/ /gtum pa'i mig can ma dang keng rus chen po'o/ /'od ldan ma dang keng rus so/ /sna chen mo dang mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'o/ /dpa' ba'i blo gros ma dang dgra'i lha'o/ /mi'u thung ma dang 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /

lang ka'i dbang phyug ma dang rdo rje 'od do/ /shing grib ma dang rdo rje'i sku'o/ /sa srung ma dang myu gu can no/ /'jigs byed chen mo dang / /rdo rje ral pa can no/ /rlung gi shugs can ma dang dpa' bo chen mo'o/ /char zam dang rdo rje hUM mdzad do/ /sngo bsangs lha mo dang shin tu bzang

bo'o/ /rab tu bzang mo dang rdo rje bzang po'o/ /rta rnam dang 'jigs byed chen po'o/ /bya gdong ma dang mig mi bzang ngo / /'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang stobs po che'o/ /rum skyes ma dang rin chen rdo rje'o/ /chang 'tshong ma dang rta mgrin no/ /'khor lo'i go cha ma dang nam mkha'i

snying bo'o/ /shin tu dpa' mo dang he ru ka'o/ /stobs chen ma dang pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug go/ /'khor los sgyur ma dang rnam par snang mdzad do/ /brtson 'grus chen mo dang rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /gshin rje mo'i bu mo dang stobs po che'o/ /gshin rje ma dang ye shes mkha' 'gro'o/ /

g.yo byed ma dang blo brtan ma'o/ /skrag byed ma dang brtan pa'o/ /gtum mo dang thar pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma dang ye shes so/ /'dod grub ma dang thabs so/ /'bar ba chen mo dang thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o/ /phyag bzhi ma la zhal gcig ma/ /thod

pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug de bzhin no/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs te/ /rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dgas gdan can drag chen mo/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang / /de bzhin

shes rab thabs ldan pa'o/ /thabs rnams dpa' bo'i rgyan ldan zhing / /dpa' mo'i ba dan gnas pa'o/ /lhag ma'i ming ni dpa' mo bzhin/ /skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya'o/ /'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyis ni/ /sgo la sogs pa'i yang de bzhin no/ /snying bo'i

pad+ma'i lha mo rnams/ /gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya/ /'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni/ /bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig /de rnams thams cad rnam bsgom bya/ /mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye/ /sprul pa'i sku can

bdag nyid do/ /gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar byung / /de yi bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o/ /lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /sgo dang grwa la gnas ma'o/ /mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni/ /thog mar rdo rje'i ming

shes bya/ /dpa' po rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni/ /de yang gnas su nges par brjod/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar grags pa'o/ /slar yang gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /de ltar sa yi dbus su yang / /sa bcu gnyis

su 'dod pa yin/ /de ltar thams cad du shes bya/ /khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad med/ /sum cu rtsa drug bshad pa rnams/ /gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin/ /de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi rang bzhin can/ /khor yug tu ni sems can

rnams/ /rdzus skyes rigs kyi rim pas so/ /de yang sum cu rtsa drug gi /yul dang yul rim pas phye ba'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /slar yang snying po'i 'khor lo 'di/ /dmar ser kha dog la de bzhin/ /'khor lo'i

rtsibs kyi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma/ /rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang / /pad+ma gar dbang don yod ma/ /spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs rdo rje/ /sgra dang dri dang ro de bzhin/ /reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma/ /sa snying ma dang mkha'

snying mo/ /phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma/ /sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo/ /rin chen sgrol ma bdag med ma/ /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /gshin mthar byed ma shes mtha' ma/ /pad mtha' ma bgegs mthar byed ma/ /mi g.yo ma dang dbyug sngon ma/ /'dod

rgyal mo dang stobs chen mo/ /gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te/ /zhal la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kun/ /lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /nye ba'i gnas su lha mo rnams/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya/ /g.yas brkyang

ba yi zhabs kyis kyang / /gzugs kye khams dang sa dri med/ /zla ba'i gling du 'dod pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de'i rgyab yon tan kun/ /zhes bya'i 'khor lo dkar dmar ba/ /rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa/ /pho nya ma

mchog sum cu drug /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mo/ /dmangs mo gtum mo khyi 'tshod ma/ /g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can/ /nya ba mo dang smyig gar ma/ dung mkhan ma dang tha ga mo/ /khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo ma/ /phreng ba khra ba tshos ma dang / /srin bal byed

ma pho nya mo/ /rus bzo ma dang rtsis mkhan ma/ /chang 'tshong ldum ra'i gnyer pa mo/ /rgyal pos bkrabs ma shan pa mo/ /so rtsi 'tshong bar byed ma dang / gser ma gang mo dang lcags mgar mo/ /nor bu brgyud ma nags pa mo/ /kla klo o Di tshong pa mo/ /rdo bzo ma dang zhing

las ma/ /ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma/ /'di rnams 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /lhag ma thams cad snying po yi/ /'khor lo ji bzhin shes par bya/ /'dir ni zhig du shes bya ste/ /'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang / /dkar po'i gling zhes bya bar bshad/ /

rang gi shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'od byed pa yis de bzhin/ /de yi phyi rol khyams rnams la/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /stong du bzhi yis nyung ba ste/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhi po la/ /nyis brgya bzhi bcu rtsa dgu dgu/ bskal pa bzang po'i

mdo nyid na/ /stong tshang bar bzhugs te/ /'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang / /'od srungs rnams ni sngar gshegs pas 'khor du mi 'os ba'i phyir dang / /shAkya thub pa ni mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rang nyid yin pa'i phyir/ /bzhi po ma gtogs pa'o/ /lha'i snam bu'i shar

nas g.yon skor du rim pas thams cad kyang pad+ma dang zla ba la bzhugs pa dka' thub kyi cha byad can sku mdog sna tshogs pa rnams te/ de yang mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po/ /byam pa dang / seng ge dang / rab gsal dang / thub pa dang / me tog dang / me tog

gnyis pa dang / spyan legs dang / ded dpon dang / lag chen dang / stobs chen dang / rgyu dkar rgyal po dang / rtsi sman dang / snyan pa'i tog nga / 'od chen dang / grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba dang / 'od 'phro dang /

'od bzangs dang / mya ngan med dang / skar rgyal dang / rab gsal dang / phreng thogs dang / yon tan 'od dang / don gzigs dang / mar me dang / mthu ldan dang / sman pa dang / des pa dang / mdzod spu dang / brtan ldan dang / lha'i dpal

dang / gdul dka' dang / yon tan rgyal mtshan dang / sgra gcan dang / tshogs ldan dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshig ldan dang / mi 'gyid pa dang / 'od mdzad dang / lhun chen dang / rdo rje dang / sdom pa can dang / mi snyems pa dang / rin po che dang /

pad+ma'i spyan dang / stobs kyi sde dang / me tog 'od zer dang / ye shes dgyes dang / gzi chen dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / klu sbyin dang / brtan gshegs dang / don yod mthong dang / brtson 'grus sbyin dang / bzang skyong dang / dga' bo dang /

'chi med dang / seng ge rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal ba dang / chos ldan dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / kha lo sgyur dang / dgyes gshegs dang / chu lha dang / yon tan lag dang / spos kyi glang po dang / rnam par gzigs dang / 'brug sgra dang / legs

sems dang / yid bzangs dang / dri med dang / zla ba dang / grags chen dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / drag shul dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / ljon pa dang / rnam par rgyal ba chen po dang / shes rab brtsegs pa dang / legs gnas dang / blo gros dang / yan

lag skyes dang / blo mtha' yas dang / gzugs bzang dang / mkhyen ldan dang / 'od zer dang / brtul zhugs brtan dang / bkra shis dang / bden pa'i tog dang / pad+ma dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag bzangs dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / yon tan

'od 'phro dang / tshangs sbyin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / lha'i me tog dang / don legs sems pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / blo gros grags pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / rnam par rol par

ldan pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / sgra gcan lha dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / tshogs chen 'od dang / rin chen snying po dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / skar rgyal dang / ru rings dang / yon tan grags dang / 'od ldan nyi zla dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / skar

mkhan dang / seng ge tog dang / dus mkhyen rgyal po dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / srid mthar gzigs pa dang / glog gi 'od dang / gser gyi ri bo dang / seng ges byin pa dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / mchog dga' grags pa dang / brtson

'grus brtan pa dang / grags rdzogs dang / bsnyengs pa bral ba/ mchod 'os lha dang / sgron mchan po dang / 'jig rten 'od dang / spos dri zhim pa dang / yon mchog 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa dang / rin chen grags pa

dang / skyon rab tu zhi ba dang / bdud rtsi 'chang dang / mi'i zla ba dang / shin tu gzigs dang / rab tu brgyan pa dang / nor bu'i 'od dang / ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog dang / don nges ldan dang / tshe sbyin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / skye dbang mtshungs dang /

stobs kyis gshegs pa dang / blo gnas pa dang / gdugs mdzes dang / gtso bo dang / shin tu 'phags pa dpal dang / seng ge'i sgra dang / rnam par rol ldan dang / klu'i 'od dang / me tog gi ri bo dang / klu dga' dang / spos kyi dbang phyug dang / shin tu grags pa

dang / stobs lha dang / yon tan phreng bar ldan pa dang / klu'i lag pa dang / mig brgyan pa dang / legs par sbyangs pa'i blo dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i ye shes dang / mtha' yas spyan dang / bden par gsung ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / des pa'i blo dang / mtha'

yas pa'i gzugs dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / rin chen tog dang / the tshom spangs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / don yod rnam par gnon pa dang / rtogs mdzad dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / ri dbang rgyal po dang / gzi brjid che dang / don mdzad

gzigs dang / grags pa mtha' yas dang / rin chen lha dang / don gnas mkhyen dang / dman min grags pa dang / mya ngan med pa dang / dri ma bral ba dang / tshangs lha dang / sa'i dbang phyug dang / me tog spyan dang / rnam par 'gyes pa'i sku

dang / chos kyi 'od dang / kun rnam gzigs dang / yon tan 'od gsal dang / zla ba'i zhal dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen tog dang / grags pa'i bla ma dang / 'od byed dang / gzi brjid dpag med dang / dus mkhyen dang / seng ge'i sku dang / mkhas blo

dang / rgyal bar dka' dang / yon tan phung po dang / zla ba'i tog dang / mthu thob pa dang / mthu rtsal mtha' yas dang / zla ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / don rnams thams cad gzigs pa dang / dpa' bo dang / 'byor par ldan pa dang / bsod nams dang / sgron

ma dang / yon tan 'phro dang / blo yangs pa dang / legs skyes dang / nor lha dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / 'dzin pa dpag med dang / mchog sred dang / choms med dang / mi gnas pa dang / bder gnas dang / tshogs can gtso bo dang / 'gro ba'i 'od zer

dang / phal chen dang / rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid mtha' yas dang / don gyi blo gros dang / sman pa'i rgyal po dang / thabs spangs dang / rims nad med pa dang / legs sbyin dang / grags sbyin dang / me tog byin dang / skyes bus byin dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / phal

chen byin pa dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / spobs pa'i glang po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / des pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / nyi zla dang / glog gi tog rnams so/ /de yis phyi rol zlum por sbyin/ /ri mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo/ /sngo dang rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba

dra ba phyed pas mdzes/ /shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang / /mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa gdong ma/ /byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ /nub tu khyi gdong can ma dang / /lho ru phag gi gdong can te/ /kha dog lnga ma sogs 'dra mchog /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ dbang ldan

mtshams na gnas pa mo/ /gshin rje mche ba pho nya mo/ /mche ba gtsigs 'joms ma rim ji bzhin/ /kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya/ /zhal ni rjes su mthun rim pas/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po thams cad kyi/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sa gzhi

rtag pa ru/ /gnag dang sngo dang lhang dang dmar/ /ser po yi ni mdog tu bya/ /lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du/ /gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhin/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /mjug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis po ri mo gsum/ /

gsum pa la ni ri mo bzhi/ /bzhi par ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /dur khrod kun nas rim pas te/ /phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni/ /zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod/ /'khor lo rim pa lnga'i bdag nyid/ /grwa bzhi pa la kun du 'bar/ /'dod pa yi yon snam bu

la/ /brgyad gnyis lha mo mchod byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams la'o/ /de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi/ /dur khrod gnas rnams bshad bya ste/ /gtum drag tshang tshing de bzhin du/ /'bar bas 'khrigs pa keng rus can/ /'jigs sde shar la sogs pa yi/ /

phyogs su g.yon skor yongs su gnas/ /a Da Da rgod dbang ldan du/ /dpal gyi nags ni sreg zar te/ /mun pa drag po bden bral du/ /rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs/ /dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /ro langs 'byung po ce spyang sgra/ /rim pa 'di yis

gnas pa ste/ /dur khrod brgyad pa rnams su yang / /shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste/ /shing Sha khyab gnas kang ke li/ /tsu ti'i shing dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /de bzhin ka ra ny+dza ka nyid/ /la ta pa r+Sha pA ra tha pi/ /dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin du/ /klu dbang dang ni gshin rje'i bdag/ /

dbang ldan de nas sreg za dang / /srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po/ /nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma nyid/ /pad chen hu lu hu lu dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong dang / /sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang / /drag po 'khyil pa mthug de bzhin/ /gang

ba char 'bebs gtum po ste/ /'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po'o/ /'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin/ /thams cad kyang 'dir de bzhin bya/ phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor

lo'o/ /de nas de'i phyi nam mkha' yi/ /'khor lo 'dam skyes sngon po mtshungs/ /sum tsu drug rtsibs dbus su yang / /mkha' spyod rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams/ /mi'am ci mo dri za mo/ /hu Tu kA ma pA Da ba ma de bzhin du/ /pi wang gling bu mu kun+da ma

dang / rdza rngam dang nges par gag+ma ri ma dang / /cha lang ma dang shI len+d+ri ki ma/ /glu ma kar Di dang ta maDA mchog dang / /gar ma sgeg mo D+ha k+ka ma dang ni/ /tA li she Na mo rnga chen mo/ /mau dri ma dang rgyud can ma dang mA tu ma/ /nA la bA mo de bzhin D+ha m+bu ki/ /Da ma ru ma dang

Shu Na Tuka ma dang de bzhin du/ /zangs rung ma dang r+ra dung ma de bzhin/ /b+hu ki ma dang dril bu ma dang dril chung ma/ /g.yer ka ma dang de bzhin Da ko li ma dang / /dung ma dang ni dbyangs ldan ma de bzhin/ /'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug ma/ /kha dor sna tshogs bkra ba'am/ /

yang na 'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /nye ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo/ /ku sha'i gling na gnas ma mchog /mkha' la spyod pa'i rigs su byon/ /gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas/ /sa ni 'od 'phro can de dang / /rang rang gnas sogs zhing can ma'o/ /yang na Di ma ru kha T+waM ga /'di ni

slar yang spangs nas su/ /rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la/ /rang gi bdag pos bya ba yin/ /'dir ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o/ /ji ltar rgyan la sogs mang po/ /

lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor kun du spyan gsum dang / /phyogs kyi gos 'chang rje 'gro ma'o/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste 'khor lo gnyis dang po'o// //de yi phyi rol rlung 'khor lo/ /sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog /rdo rje'i

rtsibs dbus sbyin bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /nam mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming / /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /mkha' lding dang mo bkra ba mo/ /bya rog bya dkar sreg pa mo/ /rma bya zangs kyi gtsug phud ma/ /gud bu li 'jam pa mo/ /phug

ron bya rog chen mo dang / /gaDI nI dang gong ma sreg /ne tso sngags ma bzhad ma dang / /bya rgod 'ug pa mchil pa mo/ /shing byi'u mo dang ngur pa mo/ /br-i k+ShA ri NI kak+ka bI/ /so bya mo dang byi la mo/ /lcug ma'i mgrin dang sA ri mo/ /khra mo gur gum lce can ma/ /bA Ti rI kA dzaMg+ha

mo/ /hor mo kaM ka mo de bzhin/ /dad da rI mo ri dgas dgra/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo/ /'khor lo'i sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog /yang na rang rang la shes bya/ /phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs/ /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'dun pa la

ni gnas ma mchog /spyad dka'i sar ni shes bya ste/ /mi'am ci yi gling mar 'dod/ /'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes dang / yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum pa yi/ /'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs can/ /bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba/ /

'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid 'dod/ /ces bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste/ /'khor lo gnyis pa'i gnyis pa'o// //de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya/ /'khor los yi ming can mchog /kha dog ser po'i rang bzhin la/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras/ /rnal

'byor ma ni sum cu drug /sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /seng ge stag mo b+hi m+b+hi ri bong ma/ /glang chen ri dgas byi la mo/ /ba dang ma he mo rnga mo/ /ce spyang mo dang bas mo 'bri/ /byi la bod mo b+hi DI ma/ /ra ma lug mo rim pa bzhin/ /khyi mo phag mo dom mo dang / /Da N+Da rI mau dz+nyA

ma de bzhin/ /dred mo dang ni sgeg mo dang / /nags ma dang ni khyim chen mo/ /bya rog chen mo khra sgo ma/ /sbrul ma bkra mo rnga mo dang / /sre mo rtsangs mo phug pa mo/ /grong na gnas pa ma mchog go/ /de ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin nam/ /yang na rang rang kha dog go/ /

lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /nye ba'i 'dun sar gnas pa mo/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang / /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /krung krung gling du gnas pa mo/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs/ /gdong pa

rang gi dngos por 'dod/ /de'i phyir bskal bzang sangs rgyas rnams/ /sngar gyi rim pas bsam par bya/ /mchod pa dang / dpal sbas dang / ye shes nyi ma dang / /don grub dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / dgra 'dul dang / pad+ma dang / dgra bcom grags pa dang / ye

shes 'gros dang / nyon mongs bral dang / 'dam bu dang / spos bzangs dang / yul 'khor rangs dang / lha grags dang / sred mtha' gzigs dang / zla ba dang / sgra gcan dang / rin chen zla ba dang / seng ge'i rgyal mtshan dang / bsam gtan dgyes dang / rdzogs

ldan dang / rnam par grol ba dang / yon tan rin chen dang / dgra bcom grags pa dang / pad+ma'i ngos dang / mdzod spu ldan dang / spobs pa grags pa dang / rdo rje nor bu dang / tshe dpag med dang / nor bu bkod pa dang / dbang chen dang / yon yan 'byung gnas

dang / lhun po grags dang / 'od zer bcu pa dang / ma smad pa dang / glang po'i 'gros dang / yid du 'thad pa dang / rin chen zla ba dang / zhi ba dang / rab gsal rgyal po dang / kha lo sgyur dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / bsnyengs bral

dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i zhal dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / zhi ba'i gzi brjid dang / dga' ba'i tog dang / sgra gcan lha dang / na tshod bzang po dang / lha dag dga' dang / rin chen phung po dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i

phyogs pa dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang / skye ba'i dbang bo dang / blo gros bzang po dang / 'jig rten 'od dang / rin chen gzi brjid dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / kun du rgyal ba dang / dga' ba bkod pa dang / stegs mdzad dang / spos kyi glang po dang /

blo gros 'od 'phro dang / ri bo'i rgyal mtshan dang / spos bzangs dang / chos brten dang / gzi brjid drag shul can dang / chos kyi nor bu dang / bzang po byin dang / bder gshegs zla ba dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / seng ge'i zla ba dang / dpal dang / legs par skyes

dang / thub pa med pa'i tshogs dang / grags pa'i gshes gnyen dang / bden pa dang / dka' thub chen po dang / lhun po'i 'od zer dang / yon tan brtsegs pa dang / mchod pa grags pa dang / chos grags pa dang / sbyin pa'i 'od dang / glog 'byin dang / bden par

gsung dang / 'tsho byed dang / na tshod bzang po dang / legs pa'i tshogs can dang / rnam par nges pa'i blo gros dang / srid mtha' nor bu'i spos dang / rgyal bas dgyes dang / seng ge'i 'od zer dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / grags mchog dang / thugs rab

gzhungs dang / nor bu zla ba dang / drag shul 'od zer dang / brtul zhugs thub med dang / 'gro bas mchod pa dang / /nor bu'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten bla ma dang / glang chen dang / seng ge dang / rtsub dang / rin chen 'od zer dang / sgra gcan sbed dang / yon tan rgya

mtsho dang / 'od zer ldan pa dang / rab tu zhi ba'i stobs dang / 'jig rten bzang po dang / mya ngan med pa dang / shugs bcu pa dang / stobs la dgyes ba dang / mthu'i dpal dang / mthu thob pa dang / mthu chen dang / yon tan snying po dang / bden par spyod pa dang /

dge mchog rgyal po dang / skal rgyal dang / 'od zer chen po dang / glog gi 'od dang / yon tan rgya chen dang / rin po che dang / dpal 'od dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / go cha bgos pa dang / seng ge'i phyag dang / me tog bzang po dang / rin chen mthon po dang / rgya

mtsho dang / swa 'dzin dang / don gyi blo mnga' ba dang / yon tan brtsegs pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs dang / rin po tshe'i me dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi zla ba dang / dbyangs snyan dang / tshangs pa'i tog dang / tshogs chen gtso bo dang / seng ge'i

stobs dang / drag can gyi byin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / gzi brjid 'od dang / 'od zer chen po dang / rin chen grags pa dang / tshogs can gsal ba dang / grags pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'od zer don yod pa dang / lha'i drang srong dang / skye

ba'i dbang po dang / dge 'dun brtan pa dang / phyogs bzangs dang / rtog dang / yul 'khor me tog dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa dang / legs pa'i grags pa dang / snang ldan dang / lha'i tshogs dang / yon tan srung dang / don gyi

blo gros dang / bsnyengs ba med pa dang / grags pa brtan pa dang / 'od gnas mtshungs pa dang / nor bu'i zhabs dang / thar pa'i gzi brjid dang / ngos bzangs dang / blo bzangs dang / kun du gzi brjid dang / ye shes mchog dang / tshangs par gnas dang /

bden par gsung dang / blo bzangs dang / stobs byin dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / me tog gi tog dang / ye shes 'byung gnas dang / me tog byin dang / yon tan snying po dang / rin chen grags pa dang / grags pa smad du byung ba dang / mi tshugs pa dang /

bsnyengs pa med pa dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / tshangs par gshegs pa dang / lha'i mthu rtsal dang / ye shes dgyes dang / lha'i bden pa dang / nor bu'i snying po dang / yon tan grags pa dang / ye shes dpal dang / bcing ba med pa dang / brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / lha'i gzi

brjid dang / tshangs thub dang / brtul bzhugs dka' thub dang / 'od zer phung po dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / tsam pa ka dang / dga' mdzad dang / tshogs can bzang po dang / dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dgyes ba chen po dang / sna ma'i me tog 'od dang / tshogs can

'od dang / skrun mdzad dang / mdangs 'gro dang / don legs nges pa dang / khyu mchog dang / lag bzangs dang / 'od zer chen po dang / bsam pas byin pa dang / bsod nams 'od dang / rin chen dbyangs dang / rdo rje sde dang / 'byor ldan dang / seng ge'i stobs dang /

dri med spyan dang / 'od srungs dang / blo gsal dang / ye shes 'gros dang / gzi brjid drag shul can dang / 'od zer chen po dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzi brjid rnam par 'byed pa dang / khengs pa med pa dang / sbrang rtsi zhal dang / zla ba'i 'od

dang / glog 'byin dang / rab tu zhi bar gshegs pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / dgra bcom grags pa dang / chos kyi yon tan dang / zhing bzang po dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / sbyin sreg 'od 'phro da nga / pad+ma'i dpal dang / rin chen

bkod pa dang / shin tu bzang po dang / rin chen mchog dang / thugs shin tu gzhungs dang / rgya mtshos byin dang / tshangs pa'i tog rnams so/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sgo ru shes bya ba/ /tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po ma/ /gzhon nu khyab 'jug ma de

bzhin/ /phag mo dbang mo gtum mo dang / /dpal chen mo ni gwa rnams su/ /sgo ru gzugs dang mtshan mo ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags/ /grwa ru brtan ma la sogs bzhin/ /shes bya 'dir ni ri mo gsum/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams so/ /chos kyi

'khor lo shin tu mdzes/ /dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste/ me yi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /gsod dang kun du skrag byed dang / 'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed de/ /drag pa'i dur khrod de bzhin du/ /g.yon skor du ni rnam par dgod/ /skrag byed dang ni sngar byed dang / lkugs

byed dang ni rengs byed slar/ /dbang ldan la sogs grwa la'o/ /shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste/ /go yu star ka nA li ra/ /se 'bru bil ba'i shing de nas/ /skyu ru bi dz+nyar ga sha'i shing / /rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod/ /dbang mo gshin rje ma chu mo/ /gnod sbyin 'byung mo drang srong ma/ /

srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste/ /'jig rten skyong ma sbyin par bya/ /klu mo srin mo thams cad ni/ /'dir ni rnam pa kun du sbyin/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor byed la/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin/ /las kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can/ /der ni gtso bo bsnom par bya/ /

zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa'o// //de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir/ /me yi 'khor lo bdag gis bshad/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar chen po/ /sum cu drug rtsibs rnams mchog la/ /rnal 'byor

ma slar dgod bya ba/ /lha sogs rigs las byung ma ste/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /'byung po ngo bo tsam po'o/ /de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci/ /lha yi rigs 'byung bshad par bya/ /ma dang chung ma sring mo dang / bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /pha yi sring mo de dang ni/ /zhang

po yi ni chung ma dang / /chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni/ /chung ma yi ni ma dang ni/ /de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma/ /chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang / /ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang / ma yi spun zla'i bu mo dang / /rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang / /spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo/ /pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang / /khu

bo yi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang / /slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang / /rang pha'i sring mo'i bu mo dang / /de nyid kyi ni rang rigs skyes/ /spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang / /bu nyid kyi ni bu mo dang / /bu de yi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i khyo yi ma yi ni/ /bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo

dang / /bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad/ /pho nya sum cu drug rnams so/ /kha dog dmar por yang dag grags/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngar dang mtshungs/ /sa ni ring du spong nyid dang / /dgra bo'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste/ /shes rab thabs bdag ngo

bo can/ /nus pa'i 'khor lor 'dir rtag tu/ /shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes pa mo/ /kun du rdo rje'i phreng la sogs/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis/ /'dir ni mchod pa byed pa yin/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams

cad/ /kun du son nas dbul bar bya/ /btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dbul/ /bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin/ /rang rang stan las langs nas ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yi/ /mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o/ /zhes bya ba ni longs

rdzogs pa'i me'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o// //de nas de yi phyi rol bshad/ /chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog dkar sum cu drug rtsibs gsal/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom/ /ma ka ra mo ru sbal nya/ /sbal mo rus sbal chu sram mo/ /sdig nag gag+gir ma shi lAM ma/ /

chu yi phug ma srin bu'i gdong ma dang / /cha gab mo kaN TI mo sU yI mo/ /chu byi mo dang grog mo'i gdong ma dang / /chu yi mi mo dang ni rgod ma dang / /glang chen mo dang stag mo ce spyang mo/ /chu sbrul mo dang dud mo 'gron bu mo/ /nya phyis ma dang nor bu dzi gu rim dang / /lI sI mo dang dud

ngu rim kar+No Ta/ /pha Ta ka mo dA ba kA ma kri mI mo/ /dzu ShI mdang sha sbrang ka lA ma/ /lha yi gtso mo mchog rnams so/ /de ltar kha dog rang bzhin ni/ /dkar mo'am rang rigs skyes pa'o/ /gdong pa rang rang gzugs kyis te/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhin no/ /nye ba'i

'du ba nyid dang ni/ /sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go/ /'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par ni/ /shes bya mtshon cha sngon bzhin no/ /yang na gang ba'i rigs sogs kyis/ /mi rnams sum cu drug blta'o/ /gnas sogs rim pa de rnams su/ /mi mo dngos su yang dag bya/ /'dzam

bu gling 'di de yis ni/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o/ /ba tsha zhes bya'i rgya mtsho ni/ /de ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams/ /drod gsher skyes dang 'du 'phrod las/ /skyes pa mngal nas skyes par bsam/ /'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes/ /me yi 'khor lo mngal

skyes so/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /shes rab thabs nyid rang ngo / /zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /sum cu drug rtsibs sna tshogs mdog /lha min mo'i

rigs rim pa dang / /til mchog ma dang phul du bde/ /lha yi bu mo dga' chen mo/ /dga' dang dgar grags bde chen ma/ /dung can sna tshogs glang chen ma/ /gzugs chen mo dang gzugs mdzes ma/ /'dod chags rnams rnam sgeg bde ba mo/ /me tog 'dod ma ut+pal

dkar/ /ut+pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang / /'dod chags ma dang 'dod chags che/ /rol grags ma dang rol chen ma/ /myos ma dang ni myos dga' ma/ /'dod pa mo dang 'dod chen mo/ /bde las byung dang bde ldan ma/ /mthun mchog ma dang

byams pa mo/ /skal bzangs ldan ma skal bzangs mo/ /dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo/ /skyes gzugs mar ni grags pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma yi gtso mo mchog /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin

shes/ /legs pa'i blo gros de bzhin/ /dur khrod rin po cher sna dang / /rang byung bde ba byed pa po/ /de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku'o/ /de nas de yi phyi rol du/ /zla gdugs dang / 'od 'phro ba dang / dri med rgyal po dang / ye shes grags pa dang / kun du rgyal ba dang /

yon tan 'od dang / sgra grags dang / zla ba rgyas pa dang / pad+ma'i 'od zer dang / brtul zhugs bzang po dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / glog gi tog dang / 'od zer rgyal po dang / skar mkhan dang / grags pa rdzogs ldan dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / rgyal dang / spyan mdzes

dang / rnyog pa med pa'i don dang / drag shul bde ba dang / bsod nams gzi brjid dang / mthu rtsal can dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang / sgra gcan lha dang / ye shes dung po dang / kha lo sgyur dang / skye dbang mtshungs dang / me tog gi tog dang / sgra gcan 'dzin

dang / sman chen po dang / rgyu skar rgyal po dang / sman pa'i rgyal po dang / bsod nams glang po dang / gcod par mdzad pa dang / rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer dang / chos kyi mdzod dang / blo gros bzang po dang / yon tan dbang mtshungs dang / rdo rje'i

sde dang / shes rab brtsegs dang / legs par gnas pa dang / blo sbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / yon tan mchog dang / 'brug sgra dbyangs dang / mngon par shes pa'i tog dang / tog gi 'od dang / dge ba dang / tshangs pa dang / skyes mchog dang / spyan

sdug pa dang / klus byin pa dang / bden pa'i tog dang / brgyan pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i dbyangs dang / rin chen 'od dang / dbyangs byin dang / seng ge dang / 'od zer sna tshogs dang / ye shes dpa' bo dang / pad+ma'i phung po dang / me tog rgyas pa dang / mthu rtsal stobs dang /

bsod nams phung po dang / gzugs mchog dang / skar mkhan dang / zla ba'i sgron ma dang / gzi brjid phung po dang / byang chub rgyal po dang / mi zad pa dang / mngon rtogs spyan dang / yan lag rgyas pa dang / yul 'khor dang / shes rab dang / mchog dang / gzi brjid

tshim mdzad dang / shes rab 'byin dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / chags pa med pa'i mdzod dang / gtso bos byin dang / gtso bo dang / ye shes mthu rtsal dang / 'od 'phro can dang / dbang po dang / shugs 'chang dang / skar rgyal dang / 'od bzangs dang / grags pa byin

dang / gzugs bzang po dang / rgyal po dang / don grub pa dang / seng ge'i sde dang / nor bu'i lha dang / grags pa dang / rgyal ba dang / rgyal chen snying po dang / bsod nams 'od zer dang / smrang 'don pa dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / ye shes brtsegs pa dang / lha mchog

dang / sa bdag dang / rnam grol brnyes dang / gtsug gi gser dang / sgra gcan bzang bo dang / thub dka' dang / thub gsal dang / zla ba'i 'od zer dang / gser gyi 'od dang / legs byin dang / lha'i yon yan dbang po dang / chos kyi gdugs dang / bsod nams lag

dang / chags med dang / ye shes gya nom dang / blo zhib mo dang / gzi byin thams cad dang / rtsi sman dang / rnam grol tog dang / 'od kyi mdzod dang / ye shes rgyal po dang / 'jigs mdzad dang / chu bo sbong ba dang / thogs med grags pa dang / bden pa'i phung po dang /

dbyangs snyan dang / ri dbang mtshungs dang / chos brtsegs dang / thar ba'i gzi byin dang / legs 'dzin dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sku dang / yid du 'ong ba'i gsung dang / blo sbyangs pa dang / chu lha dang / 'gro bas mchod dang / seng ge'i logs dang / chos kyi mthu rtsal dang / skal

pa bzang po dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i mdog dang / gzi brjid rgyal bo dang / rtogs mdzad dang / spyan legs pa dang / don la gnas pa'i blo mnga' ba dang / snang ba'i 'od zer dang / spos kyi gzi brjid dang / kun du dga' bar mdzad pa dang / /don yod par

gshegs pa dang / khro ba bcom dang / gzugs mchog dang / legs gshegs dang / rab tu sbyin par grags dang / 'od gtsang dang / lha'i nyi ma dang / shes rab byin pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i bdag nyid dang / gzi mdangs dang / rgyal rigs dang / skal

ldan shing rta dang / gser mchog dang / rnam par grol ba'i gtsug lag dang / chos ldan dang / spos gnas dang / dregs spangs dang / ye shes mdzod dang / tshangs par gshegs dang / tsan+dan dang / mya ngan med dang / seng ge'i 'od zer dang / yul 'khor tog dang / pad+ma'i

snying bo dang / gzi brjid mtha' yas dang / lha'i 'od zer dang / shes rab tog dang / mkhas pa dang / ye shes 'byor ldan dang / tshangs pa'i dbyig dang / phyag na rin chen dang / dbang ldan dang / rdzogs par gsungs dang / mchog tu gsungs dang / mchod 'os dang /

skar rgyal dang / nyi ma dang / 'dam las rgal ba dang / ye shes brnyes pa dang / grub pa dang / rma bya dang / chos byin dang / phan par bzhed pa dang / ye shes ldan pa dang / grags pa dang / 'od zer dra ba dang / rnam par bcom pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i snying po dang / me tog dang /

lha'i rgyal po dang / zla ba dang / dran pa'i 'od dang / dge ba'i 'od dang / yon tan mchog ma kun gyi 'od dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / skyes bu zla ba dang / sgra gcan dang / bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / 'jig rten gyi mchog dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / zhi ba'i stobs dang / ye shes rgya mtsho

dang / ri bo'i dbang po dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / yon tan mtha' yas ba'i stobs dang / lha'i dbang po dang / dbyangs snyan dang / ngos bzangs dang / don la gnas pa dang / yon tan gzi brjid dpal dang / mkhyen ldan zla med dang / nga ro dpag med dang / 'od bzangs dang /

shin tu thugs gzhungs dang / don dgongs gti mug bral ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags dang / mchog tu mdzes par gshegs dang / zhi ba'i don dang / skyon med dang / blo sbyangs dge ba dang / pad+ma'i mdzod dang / 'od zer bzang po dang / spobs pa'i

mdog dang / stegs bzang po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po dang / bsnyengs pa dang bral ba dang / ye shes bzhed pa dang / spobs pa'i spyan dang / blo'i mchog dang / zla ba dang / rin chen zla 'od dang / bsnyengs pa med pa dang / gzigs pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /

dbyangs bzang po dang / shes rab chen po'i stegs dang / blo gros zla med dang / rdo rje mkhregs pa dang / byang chub blo gros dang / ljon shing dbang po dang / gdangs snyan pa dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang / mthu'i dpal rnams so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /

rnal 'byor ma rnams rim bzhin du/ /dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /za phod ma yang rnam par dgod/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /sbos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin/ /gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo ste/ /rim pas sngon bzhin brtag ces bya/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum

pa la/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis/ /kun nas ri mo bzhi can no/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'khor lo ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /byis pa gsod dang lhag ma za/ /g.yul drag po dang mche ba kun/ /shar la sogs pa g.yon skor du/ /de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam/ /

ru ba mun nag nang gi me/ /hA hA'i sgra dang sgra chen no/ /shing ni tsan+dan ga pur dang / /dzA ti pha la dang e la/ /nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang / kun du ru dang lha yi shing / /phyogs skyong rnam ni mtshon bya ba/ /nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu/ /ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid/ /ngan spang nyi ma'i

bu de bzhin/ /lha min mgo bor shes bya ste/ /drag po'i gdong rnams su bya'o/ /'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang / /mdung rings spu gri brag de bzhin/ /glog dang sna tshogs mtshon 'bebs bar/ /dur khrod kyi ni dbus su bya/ /ral gri mig sman ri lu dang / /rkang pa byug dang bcud

len dang / mchil lham dngul chus 'og gi /dngos grub bsgrub pa mkhas par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid do// //de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /thugs

kyi 'khor lo 'di gsal ba'o/ /mdog rnams sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs/ /thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog /klu mo gnod sbyin mo 'byung mo/ /yi dwags dmyal mo mnar med ma/ /lhung ba mo dang bar med ma/ /bum mo gshin rje ma de bzhin/ /thig nag ma dang me

mdag mo/ /tsha ba mo dang rab tsha mo/ /ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che/ /mar nag du 'tshed ri gnyis 'tshir/ /sdang ma rmongs ma phrag dog ma/ /chags myos ser sna skud pa ma/ /grang ma ral gri'i nags ma nyid/ /rngu ma dang ni mu ge ma/ /nang dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang / /chu yi

dgon pa ma dang ni/ /ral gri sen mo rab med ma/ /spu gri'i so ma 'khor lo ma/ /grul bum mo ste lha mo che/ /mdag ni 'khor lo ji 'dra ba'o/ /phyag na mtshon cha sngon bzhin du/ /shes bya rang gi gzugs can no/ /de la nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /de nas sa na chos kyi sprin/ /

sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod/ /rang bzhin spangs pas bdag med pa/ /'khor lo can sar bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo rnams ni rim ji bzhin/ /thams cad de ltar shes par bya/ /gnas bzhi rnams la bcu gnyis so/ /de ltar

bcu drug ces bya ba/ /stong pa nyid du mkhas pa yi/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir/ /dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid ming gis so/ /phyi nas gzhan ni thams cad ni/ /'khor lo gnyis su shes

par bya/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dang po'o// //de nas phyi rol du gzhan pa/ /gsung gi 'khor lo de bshad pa/ /dmar po btsod kyi kha dog ste/ /sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid gtso/ /mchod pa za ma gnyis ma dang / /le lo ma chos sems sgom mo/ /khyim sems bud

med sems ma dang / /don sems ma dang sbyong bral ma/ /bu sems rnams dang mya ngan nam/ /bsam gtan ma dang sngags zlos ma/ /ngo tsha nga rgyal gdungs pa mo/ /sems can don byed brtson ma dang / /rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod ma/ /ye shes thob ma dka' thub ma/ /

rgas ma 'chi ba'i bsam can ma/ /bde ma sdug ma mi dge ma/ /yod dang med dang gnyis dang ni/ /bla ma sems ma 'gre ba mo/ /bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma/ /ngal sos ma dang bkres pa mchog /las ni thams cad byed lha mo/ /rang bzhin 'khor lo 'di che ba'o/ /

kha dog rang bzhin 'khor lor grags/ /lhag ma 'dir ni sngon bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo/ /rang bzhin gyis ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud stong phrag ni/ /bcu gnyis pa las bshad pa ste/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi/ /mchod sogs lha

mor 'dod pa bzhin/ /grong mtha'i gnas ni 'di lta bu/ /kun du 'od kyi sa yin no/ /de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mtha'/ /rlung me chu dang nam mkha' yis/ /bskor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya bas/ /rdo rje mchog mang shes par par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnyis pa sprul ba'i

'khor lo'o// //de nas sku yi 'khor lo bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi kha dog can/ /sum cu rtsa drug dbyibs 'dra ba/ /rnal 'byor ma 'khor sgyur ma'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi rigs ma dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor sgyur ma/ /'thab bral dga' ldan 'khor sgyur ma/ /

'phrul dga' ma dang de bzhin du/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni/ /tshangs ris ma yi 'khor lo ma/ /tshangs pa mdun 'don ma de bzhin/ /tshangs pa chen po 'khor sgyur ma/ /'od chung tshad med 'od ma dang / /'od gsal ma dang dge chung ma/ /tshad med dge ba'i 'khor

sgyur ma/ /dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma/ /bsod nams skyes ba'i 'khor lo dang / /'bras bu che ba'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /mi che mi gdung 'khor sgyur ma/ /shin tu mthong ma bzang snang ma/ /'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma/ /rnam shes mtha'

yas skye mched ma/ /ci'ang med skye mched ma de nas/ /'du shes 'du shes med min ma/ /dmyal mo yi dgas ma de bzhin/ /dus 'gro mi mo lha min mo/ /gzhal med mkha' spyod ma de bzhin/ /zla mo nyi mo gshin rje mo/ /dbang mo 'khor sgyur mar shes bya/ /rang

gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngar bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te/ /nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas/ /sa ni mos par spyod pa'o/ /de nas de yi phyi khyams la/ /'phags pa dgyes pa dang / mthu stobs dang / /skar mal dgyes pa dang /

sprin gyi rnga sgra dang / /spyan sdug zhal dang / /ye shes bzang ldan dang / 'byor ldan dang / yon tan phung po dang / gsal ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes nga ro dang / nam mkha' dang / mchod sbyin nga ro dang / shes rab rnam dgod nga ro dang / yon tan 'od zer gzi

brjid dang / drang srong dbang po dang / blo ldan dang / stobs pa'i tshogs dang / mchod sbyin bzang po dang / zla ba'i zhal dang / shin tu gzigs dang / rdul bral dang / yon tan tshogs dang / tog ldan dang / bsod nams rgyal mtshan dang / yul 'khor spobs pa dang /

rin chen rab sbyin dang / zla dgyes dang / seng ge'i stobs dang / dbang sgyur rgyal po dang / bdud rtsi gsal ba dang / bsam gtan snyoms dang / 'khrul ba med pa dang / dri ma rab tu zhi ba dang / phyogs ma bslad dang / mdzes pa dang / /zhal bzangs dang / shugs gnas ye

shes ldan dang / gsung gi dbang po dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / blo gros zab mo dang / bdud rtsi dang / chos kyi stobs dang / /me tog 'od dang / khams gsum dag gi mchod pa'i gnas dang / sgra gcan nyi mar snying bo dang / lha'i mchod pa dang /

thar pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / dge ba'i gtsug dang / bdud rtsi'i 'od dang / rdo rje dang / brtan pa dang / rin chen phung po dang / mdzes par gshegs dang / nyi ma lta bur gshegs pa dang / dag pa'i 'od dang / yon tan gtsug dang / dpal rdzogs pa dang / seng ge'i

stangs dang / gyen du 'phags pa dang / me tog byin dang / 'od 'gyed pa dang / pad+ma dang / ye shes dgyes pa dang / bkod pa mdzes dang / gti mug med par gnas pa dang / rma med pa dang / tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / bde bar dgongs dang / gti mug med pa'i rgyal

po dang / cho ga mkhyen pa dang / dag pa'i rgya mtsho dang / rin chen mnga' ba dang / mi mnga' ba dang / skye bo dga' mdzad dang / rma bya'i nga ro dang / ma zhum pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i dri ma spangs pa dang / spyod pa'i stegs dang / lha mang dag gi snyan par bsgrags pa dang / rin po

che'i stabs dang / phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa dang / dpal dang / dgra las rgyal ba dang / 'byor ldan grags pa dang / yul 'khor bzang po dang / me tog 'od dang / seng ge'i nga ro dang / zla ba ltar shar ba dang / 'joms pa'i mchog dang / mi g.yo ba dang / phan par

ldan bar gshegs pa dang / bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / dbyangs kyis bskul ba dang / gau tam dang / mdangs stobs dang / blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin dang / zla ba bzang po dang / byang chub yan lag me tog spos dang / bkra shis dang / legs ston dang / ye shes

gzi brjid stobs dang / mthu rtsal brtan po dang / lha'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nyi ma'i zhal dang / thar pa'i brtul zhugs dang / tshul khrims 'od dang / brtul zhugs gnas pa dang / rdul med pa dang / snying po 'phags pa dang / mig sman dang / 'phel bar mdzad

pa dang / spos kyi 'od dang / dus gsum mkhyen pa'i 'od dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / thogs pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub mchog tu bgrod pa dang / spyod pa gsal ba dang / rin chen dgyes dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / lha thams cad pa dang / bshes

gnyen chen po dang / bshes gnyen bzang po dang / rab tu zhi ba'i stabs dang / bdud rtsi'i bdag po dang / lhun po'i 'od dang / 'phags pas bstod dang / snang ldan dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / snang ba gzigs dang / legs spyad rnam par smin dang / legs dgyes

dang / mya ngan bral dang / rin chen 'od dang / spyod par ldan dang / bsod nams stobs dang / yon tan rgya mtsho dang / rmad du byung ba dang / nga rgyal spong ba dang / bdud brlag mdzad dang / bag chags la sa rgal ba'i stobs dang / mi phyed ba'i blo

mnga' ba dang / rgya mtsho dang / dag par mdzad pa dang / tshogs can sgrol ba'i rgyal po dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / byang chub rgyal mtshan dang / ye shes rin chen dang / shin tu bsil ba dang / tshangs pa rgyal ba dang / ye shes dgyes dang / rdzu 'phrul tog dang / skye

dbang mtshungs dang / sa'i dbang phyug dang / nyi ma dgyes dang / sgra gcan zla ba dang / me tog 'od dang / sman pa'i bdag po dang / mdangs mnga' ba dang / bsod nams dgyes dang / dga' ba'i stobs dang / dbyangs snyan pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / tshangs

pa'i dbyangs dang / spyod bzangs dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i blo dang / dbyangs chen po dang / snyan par grags pa dang / tog ldan dang / gzi brjid rnam par grags pa dang / 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / ljon pa dang / gti mug rab tu zad pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang /

zla ba bzang po dang / spobs pa mtha' yas tog dang / brtul zhugs brtan pa dang / mchod pa'i gnas dang / mya ngan rgal ba dang / dge ba dgyes pa dang / 'gro ba'i blo gros dang / dgyes par gshegs dang / zhabs mdzes pa dang / ut+pal dang / dul gnas me tog dang /

spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer dang / drang srong gsal ba dang / yon tan brtson 'grus dang / snying bo dang / lha'i bdag po dang / rin chen mthon po dang / gsal ba dang / skal ldan shing rta can dang / bsod nams blo gros dang / sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang / yon tan mtha'

yas gzi brjid phung po dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab gsal dang / 'od spyod dang / klu dbyangs dang / 'khor lo 'dzin dang / dbyig gi mchog dang / 'jig rten las dga' ba dang / /chos zla dang / dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa dang / sprin gyi tog

dang / shes rab 'gros dang / spos bzang dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs dang / lha dang / lha'i rgyal ba dang / nor bu gsal dang / nor bu gsal dang / nor bzangs dang / sgron ma dang / rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs dang / skye dbang rgyal po dang / sgra gcan sbeng dang / dga' ba mdzad pa dang / seng ge'i

blo gros dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rin chen grags pa dang / don mdzad dang / mdzad pa mtha' yas gzigs pa dang / srid pa'i me tog dang / mdzod sbu ldan dang / spobs ba mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyal po dang / ye shes rnam par 'byed pa'i nga ro dang / seng ge'i mche ba

dang / mdzes bar gshegs pa dang / bsod nams sgron ma dang / bkra shis ldan dang / yul 'khor mya ngan med pa dang / blo gros sems dpa' dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i spyan dang / shin tu gzigs dang / shugs kyi 'od 'dor ba dang / stobs can dang /

shes rab me tog dang / brtan pa'i dbyangs dang / bde ldan dang / don gsungs dang / dgyes par gsal ba dang / seng ge'i zhal dang / gtsug phud dang / snang mdzad rnams te thams cad phyag rgya sna tshogs mdzad pa'o/ /'khor lo 'di ni gru bzhi ste/ /sprul ba'i sku ni

'du shes so/ /ri mo lnga ni me long sogs/ /thams cad mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma'o/ /brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yis/ /mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'o/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnams te/ /sgo skyod ma ni rim ji bzhin/ /shar du chu skyes dkar mo sgom/ byang du

gan+dA ri mo'o/ /nub du rdo rje gar ma ste/ /lho ru rta rdod ma yi kha/ /gru yi char ni lha mo bzhi/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /lha mo rdo rje 'bar zhal ma/ /rdo rje khro gnyer ma yi zhal/ /rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste/ /kha dog la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /drag mo chen

mo gtsigs ba'i zhal/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes ma'o/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun ji lta ba'o/ /kun la mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can/ /ral ba'i cod pan dpa' de rnams/ /yan lag kun

la thal bas bsdus/ rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyi/ /nu ma mkhrang zhing mtho ba ste/ /lag gdub spyi gtsug brgyan pa dang / mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba/ /dang

por tshig par shes bya ste/ /gnyis pa yang ni ma tshig par/ /gsum bar dum bur gyur pa nyid/ /bzhi pa yang ni ma gtubs pa/ /lnga pa 'jigs su rung ba bshad/ /drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa/ /bdun pa gsal shing bug pa ste/ /steng nas btags pa brgyad pa'o/ /

dur khrod brgyad por rtag tu ni/ /dmyal srung chen po brgyad rnams so/ /shA ma li shing mya ngan med/ /yongs 'du uwAr de bzhin no/ /Do m+ba ri dang gaM b+ha ri/ /rgya shug dang ni ba ru rA'o/ /sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs/ /mkha'

spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan/ /gang yin de yang rdzu 'phrul che/ /mgo med rgyug dang gzhan yang ni/ /mgo bo med par gar byed dang / /nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang / /mgo bo lus sogs gtub pa ste/ /ting 'dzin chen po rgyu yis ni/ /de ltar gar bcas gar byed pa'o/ /

de ltar de yi dbus su ni/ /rgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin/ /kha dog sna tshogs shes bya ste/ /bzhon pa gang gang gi yin pa'o/ /de ltar dur khrod kun la bya/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid/ /yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku

gsum gyi bdag nyid dang sprul ba dang lhan cig ba ste gsum pa'o// //gtso bo'i thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM gi sa bon ljang sngon bsam par bya'o/ /mgo bor zla ba dang la 'khor lo la gnas pa'i oM dkar po'o/ /mgrin par zla ba dang pad+ma la gnas pa'i AHdmar

po'o/ /snying gar zla ba dang rdo rje la gnas pa'i hUM sngon po'o/ /dkyil 'khor ba thams cad la'ang snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM rang rang gi kha dog can yod par bsam par mos par bya'o/ /de nas gtso bo'i thugs ka'i hUM gnyis kyi bar du raM dmar bo las nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor ro/ /de'i steng du oM ha baM hA bUM/ hi baM hI bI/ hu bu hU phU/ he be hai be ho bo hau bau haM baM haHbaHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ zhes bya ba kha dog dkar dmar g.yon skor du sbrul 'khyil ba ltar gnas pa rdo rje sems dpa' dang phag mo'i ngo bo/ /mgo bor de bzhin du nyi ma la

oM na haM nA hAM ni hiM nI hIM nu hUM nU hUM na heM neM hoM noM hoM naHhaHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ ser zhing sngo bas rnam par snang mdzad do/ /gshin rje ma'i rang bzhin no/ /spyi gtsug tu nyi ma la oM swa hraM swA hrAM swi hriM srAM hrAM swuM hruM swe hriM srai hraiM swo hroM swau hroM swa hraM swaHhrAHhU hUM hUM hUM phaT

phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ zhes bya ba dmar zhing dkar ba pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang rmongs byed ma'i ngo bo'o/ /dpung ba gnyis kyi nang du nyi ma la/ /oM ba hraM bA hrAM baM hriM bI hrIM bu hruM bru hrAM be hreM bai hraiM bo hroM bau hrauM ba hra baHhraHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ zhes bya ba gnag cing ser ba he

ru ka dang skrod byed ma'o/ /spyan gnyis pa la nyi ma'i steng du/ oM hUM hUM haM haM hAM hAM/ hiM hiM hIM hIM/ hUM hUM heM heM haiM haiM hoM hoM hauM hauM haM haM haH haHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ zhes bya ba rnams dmar zhing ljang ba rdo rje nyi ma dang skrag byed ma'o/ /mdzod spu'i thang ka'i nang du nyi ma la

oM phaT phaT pha pha phA phA phi phi phI phI phu phu phu phU phU phe phe phai phai pho+o pho phau phau phaM phaM phaHphaHhUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA swA hA/ zhes bya ba ljang zhing dud ka rta mchog dang gtum mo ste 'di las yi ge'i tshogs 'phros pas rkang mthil nas spyi po'i bar du de'i rdul phra rab bo/ /lus kyi

phyi rol du oM ha dkar po snying ga dang / na ma hi ser po mgo bo la dang / swA hA hu dmar po spyi gtsug tu dang / bau Sha DaM he nag po dpung ba gnyis la dang / hUM hUM ho dmar ser mig gnyis la dang / yan lag thams cad la phaT haM ljang gu'o/ /rdo rje phag mo'i lte bar oM baM

dmar po dang / haM yoM sngon mo snying gar ro/ /hriM mo dkar mo kha la'o/ /hriM hriM ser mo mgo bo la'o/ /hUM hUM ljang gu spyi gtsug tu'o/ /phaT phaT dud ka smin mtshams su bkod de/ de las 'phros pa'i lus thams cad dgang ba'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis

su med par bya ste/ de yang 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dpral bar bskor ba dang / rkang pa g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan pa dang / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mdun du spyan drags te sa bon las spros ba'i pi wang ma la sogs

pas yang dag par mchod de/ dzaHzhes pas rang rang gi steng du dgug pa dang / hUM gis chu la chu zhugs pa bzhin du gzhug pa dang / baM gyis bcing ba dang / haMHyis dgyes par bya'o/ /de nas yang rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis dpal gsang ba 'dus pa nas 'byung ba'i cha

lugs can/ rigs lnga dpag tu med pa spyan drangs pa rnams la yang pi wang ma la sogs pas mchod de/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag la khrus byed 'gyur/ /lha yi chus ni dag par mdzod/ /ces gsol

ba gdab pas/ de rnams snyoms par zhugs pa'i dga' ba'i sgras phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad zhal du bcug ste zhu bas rdo rje lam nas byung ba/ /lha mo'i pad+ma dang gnyis kyi bar nas byung ba'i rang byung gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis thams cad la blugs par bya'o/ /de nas

lha thams cad kyi spyi bo'i chu'i thigs pa rnams las bdag po bsam pa ni gtso bo la mi bskyod pa'o/ /phag mo la 'od dpag med do/ /pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams la rin chen 'byung ldan no/ /sgo mtshams ma rnams la don yod grub pas so/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo ba rnams

la ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /snying po'i 'khor lo ba rnams la 'od dpag med do/ /yon tan gyi 'khor lo ba rnams la rnam par snang mdzad do/ /nam mkha'i 'khor lo ba rnams la mi bskyed pa'o/ /rlung gi 'khor lo ba rnams la rnga sgra'o/ /sa'i 'khor lo ba rnams la rin chen 'byung

ldan no/ /me'i 'khor lo ba rnams la 'od dpag med do/ /chu'i 'khor lo ba rnams la sangs rgyas so/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo ba rnams la sangs rgyas so/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo ba rnams la rnga sgra'o/ /thugs kyi 'khor lo ba rnams la mi bskyod pa'o/ /gsung gi 'khor lo ba rnams la 'od dpag med do/ /sku'i 'khor lo

ba rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ste/ sprul ba sku'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /bskal pa bzang po pa thams cad la med do/ /de nas rigs lnga rnams kyis/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hUM zhes brjod nas bdag po rnams la thim par gyur to/ /de nas rang gi sa bon

las spros pa'i pi wang ma la sogs pa dang / /gau rIl sogs pa'i lha mo grangs med pa spros la bdag nyid dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod par bya'o/ /de yang / gau rI ri dgas sbyar can 'dzin/ /tso rI ma ni nyi ma'i snod/ /be tA lI ni chu'i lag pa/ /sman 'dzin pa ni g+hasma

rI/ /puk+ka sI ni stobs la gcan/ /sha ba rI ro 'dzin de bzhin/ /tsa N+Da lI ma Da ru sgrogs/ /mgrin pa nas 'khyud DoM bi nI/ /zhes so/ /mchod pa de rnams kyang don 'di ltar bya ste/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa dang / bde chen sogs dang bzang po dang / /gnyis

kun rnam par spangs pa dang / /mchod pa khams gsum bdag nyid ni/ /dngos po kun 'byung rnams kyis so/ /de nas lha mo de rnams kyis sngags kyi bstod par byed bar 'gyur te/ /de dag kyang gang zhe na/ /oM shrI badzra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT DA ki nA dzA la shaM par swA hA/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi snying po'o/ /oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM na mo b+ha ga wa te pI re shA ya huM hUM phaT/ /oM ma hA ka wA g+nis n+ni b+hA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dza TA ma kuTo t+ka TA ya huM hUM phaT/ /oM daMSh+TA ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su rA ya huM hUM phaT/ o pa ra shu pA

shod+ya ta shU la kha T+wI ga d+hA ri Ne huM hU phaT/ oM byA g+hu dzinA m+bar d+ha rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA d+hU m+thA n+d+ha ka rA ba puShA ya huM hUM phaT/ rkang pa brgyad pa'o/ /oM na maHshrI badzra DA ka ma hA bI ra bI ra shwa rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM tri b+hu paN kam+ba kam+bA baNA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM daM Sh+nyAt+ka Ta Sh+nyA Sha Na b+hai ra bA ya huM hUM

phaT/ oM sha ta sa ha sra ne trA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bi d+yu dz+dzi hA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM kaM kA la mA lA b+har No grA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dz+wA lA wa lIDa lag+nA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bar shu pA sho d+yata shU lA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ka wA n+ta d+nu mra u gra wa pu ShA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ka Ta mu kha

hA hA ra bA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM mA tr-i ga Na ba ri bU ri tA ma nA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sa ha dza sun+ta rI bal+la b+ha ka rA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM kA rots+tsa ra Na mu khA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sh+ma shA na pri yA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba b+hU ta saM tA sa na ka rA ya huM hUM phaT/ /oM ma hA

ka wA natA g+ni te dza ya huM hUM phaT/ oM dza nA ka lA ba mu kuTA ya huM hAM phaT/ /o kha TI d+ga ka pA la shU la b+hin+na d+ha ri Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sa mu dra me kha lA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM b+y+wa g+h+rA tsa rmA m+ba ra d+ha ri Ne huM hUM phaT/ /oM be tA la saM g+ha marda Na ka rA ya huM hUM phaT/ /oM ma dA big+hA ni bA ri Ne huM hUM phaT/
