par rgyal ba'i bum pa gzhag /mkha' 'gro ma tshogs bum pa bzhi/ /de yi mtshan mas mdzes par bya/ /ji lta'i gnas su bzhag nas ni/ /dri drug sogs pas legs par dgang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis legs bkang ba'i/ /thod pa'i mtshan ma legs par brtag /bum pa bzhi po

gzhan rnams ni/ /'bad pas mtshams su gzhag par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i bum pa ni/ /he ru ka yi mtshan mas mtshan/ /bi mu mA ra bid legs bkang / /bgegs kun rnam par sel bar byed/ /mchod nas gus pas gsol btab ste/ /lho yi sgo ru legs par gzhag

rtag tu rdo rjes gdug pa kun/ /myur ba nyid du sel bar byed/ /phyi rol bum pa'i mtshan ma gang / /thams cad ji ltar gsungs bzhin bstan/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor bum pa yi/ /mtshan nyid lus las byung ba'o/ /bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /lho ru mngon phyogs

sngags pa ni/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /he ru ka ma dang sbyor la/ /legs chags 'dzum bcas dga' zhing spro/ /bar ma mchog dang dbus dbyung dang / /me tog spos la sogs pa yis/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pa rtag spyod pas/ /bde mchog dpa' bo mchod par bya/ /g.yon

pas blangs pa'i spos dang ni/ /mi yi sha dang ldan pa yis/ /bdugs par gyur nas sngags pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dpal ldan he ru ka sogs nam mkha'i dkyil gyur mkha' spyod sa spyod dang / /sa 'og gnas bzhugs lhan cig skyes pa'i bde dang ldan ba stan dang tshan+do ha lha mo/ /

dkyil 'khor gnas pa de kun dus mtha'i me ltar spyod la dngos grub rgyur ni gsol ba btab/ /he ru ka dpal phag mor bcas/ /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /phyogs kun bzhugs pa dpa' bo dang / /byang chub sems dpa' bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po kun brnyes shing / /de

rnams bzhugs par gyur pa rnams/ /che ge mo bdag rdo rje che/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal/ /brtse bas bskyed par gyur nas ni/ /nye ba nyid du mdzad du gsol/ /dri zhim me tog legs

par bsregs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni/ /blangs nas spos bdug 'khor lo dang / /skye bo dam pa kun 'dus pa'o/ /lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /dpa' bo lha mo dkyil 'khor bzang / /mchod cing gsol btab de nas ni/ /phyi rol song nas slob ma bzang / /stobs chen me

tog lag na thogs/ /brtson 'grus che ldan shes rab che/ /rigs dang ldan zhing nga rgyal med/ /bde mchog mnyes byed mkhas pa dang / /phag mo la gus snying du sdug /phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /thal ba yis ni byugs pa dang / /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi cho ga shes/ /rnal 'byor

ma rgyud la dad pa'o/ /gang gang gus dang ldan pa yi/ /sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs/ /gzugs bzang shin tu mdzes brtson dang / /chang la dga' bas myos pa la/ /slob ma'i dbang bskur don gyis ni/ /kun nas de la gsol ba gdab/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang

shes na/ /'byung gnas la sogs rnam par bsam/ /mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang / /gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i mi/ /skyes pa'am bud med 'di don du/ /dpal ldan bde mchog las rab bstan/ /bde mchog lta bur rdzogs nas ni/ /gsol ba 'debs par rnam par

bsam/ /dpa' bo khyod bdag rdo rje che/ /phag mo lhan cig yang dag ldan/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug rnams/ /phag mo

dang ni he ru ka'i/ /gsang ba'i stan sogs legs par dag /gnas pa'i lugs ni bstan du gsol/ /slob ma'i gtso bo mdun byas te/ /me tog phreng 'dzin dag sems la/ /g.yon pas kun nas blta byas te/ /rab tu rgyas pa'i bzhin gyis smra/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /khyod ni tshul chen

snod yin pas/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang / /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /da ltar byung ba'i dpa' bo ni/ /'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /cho ga bzang

po 'di mkhyen nas/ /shes rab yan lag gnyis med chub/ /dpa' bos thams cad mkhyen pa thob/ /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med de/ /he ru ka dpal sogs mchog gis/ /bdud sde 'jigs pa chen po yi/ /stobs chen po ni gang gis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /

bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ /byang chub bsgrub pa'i don gyi rgyud/ /cho ga thams cad khyod la sbyin/ /de nas slob ma ser sna bral/ /dpa' bo chen po rnam dag pa'i/ /bla ma la gsol dga' ba des/ /sdom pa mchog ni bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /'khor

lo gsum gyi rnam gzugs can/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams bye brag gis/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug gang / /rgyal ba'i sras 'di thams cad la/ /kun la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /dngos po kun gyi de nyid kyis/ /bla ma la ni skyabs su mchi/ /'dir ni dngos grub kun mdzad cing / /

snying rje'i ro yis khengs gyur pa/ /dpal ldan he ru ka sogs dang / /lha mo kun gyis bdag bsrung mdzod/ /che ge mo bdag dpa' bo che/ /sems can kun la phan par dga'/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /dngos grub sbyin bdag bdag gyur cig /blo ldan ston pa'i khrag gis ni/ /de

dag rnams la thig le bya/ /snying rje sems can don la brtson/ /de dag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ /zhal gyis spyan ras gzigs blangs te/ /mgo yi steng du blugs par bya/ /slob ma 'di dag thams cad ni/ /bsrung bar gyur par the tshom med/ /lhag par gnas pa'i slob ma ni/ /

'bad pas btang ste mnyam par gzhag/ dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang dgyes la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod byas nas/ /bud med bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phag mo'i nu ma 'tshir ba dang / /bza' dang bca' ba la sogs pas/ /kun gyis 'khor lo bde mchog mchod/ /slob ma lhag

par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //nang par dpa' bo chen po ni/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan pas/ /phag mor sbyor bar legs gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /khro med gtsang ma mkhas pa dang / /sbyor shes ye shes pha rol song / /thod pas spyi bo rab brgyan

cing / /yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang / /sku la phyag rgya drug la sogs/ /rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga ni lag na thogs/ /phreng ba brgya yi phyed kyis brgyan/ /he ru ka yi bdag nyid byas/ /'khor lo snying gar bsam byas te/ /de ltar bdag nyid go bgos shing / /

sngags dang phyag rgyas brgyan byas nas/ /dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas ro yi skud pa ni/ /khrag chen po yis brlan byas te/ /he ru ka dpal go 'phang mchog /dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab pa'o/ /khru gang pa'am khru

gnyis pa/ /yang na bzhi pa dag kyang rung / /bcu gnyis pa'am bcu drug las/ /lhag pa yongs su mi brtag go/ /de las gzhan du brtags na ni/ /slob dpon ye shes dman gyur pa/ /gang du sdig can mi 'gro ba'i/ /'jigs pa'i dmyal bar de 'gro 'gyur/ /mkha' 'gro ma

sogs rang gzugs su/ /skad cig tsam gyis legs par byung / /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'i thig /de bzhin du yang gang gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi ye shes che/ /thig gi dbus su gyur par dgod/ /'di dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gsang

chen dam pa rmad du byung / /mig tu dzaHlas nyi zla bsam/ /he ru ka dpal bdag nyid gnas/ /'bar ba'i blta ba legs bkug nas/ /rang rang thig la gzhug par bya/ /he ru ka sogs 'khor lo bzang / /shes rab thabs dang mnyam ldan pas/ /phyi rol stan gnas bkug nas

ni/ /thig gi dbus su rnam par bsam/ /rtsa sogs pa yi gsang sngags dang / /snying po nye ba'i snying po yis/ /me tog ldan pa'i khrag gis byug /rnal 'byor rig pas thod par gzhag /thig skud legs par mngon par bsngags/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis bsrung / /bdud rtsi

lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /kha dog lnga pa cho ga ldan/ /thig skud de ni gcig tu bsgril/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlab/ /dpal lha dngos grub kun byed cing / /chos kyi gnas te dri ma med/ /bla ma phreng ldan gyis blangs nas/ /g.yon pas slob ma la byin bya/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i

sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo'i gtso bo bsgril bar bya/ /legs bsgril slob ma la btang nas/ /dza dza zhes pas bdun du gnas/ /de nas slob mas kyang brjod pa/ /rang gis kyang ni dza dza brjod/ /bla ma slob mas blangs nas ni/ phag mo'i sbyor bas legs par gnas/ /dang po'i

las can sngags pa yis/ /dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /ye shes cung zad thob pa yis/ /khye'u bzang dang bu mo la/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma phab nas/ /thig gdab phyir na gsol ba btab/ /de yis 'khor lo bde mchog bzang / /stan sogs pa yi lha mo kun/ /lhan

cig skyes dang yang dag ldan/ /mdzes par gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang / /tshon rtsi dag ni dgye ba dang / /sngags kyi sems pas mi bya ste/ /byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'/ /de bas dam tshig cho ga shes/ /sngags

kyi lha rnams bcug nas ni/ /byin rlabs go gor bsams byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni rab tu brtags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /mA ma kI ni dbab par bya/ /de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi/ /gsang ba mchog ste rmad du byung / /rang nyid mkhas par gyur pa yis/ /de

ltar byas na nye bar 'gyur/ /byon par gyur nas gsang ba'i mchog /mnyes par ldan pas 'di dag bri/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ ji bzhin 'khor lo'i ji bzhin gnas/ /ji bzhin bkod pa 'gro ji bzhin/ /'khor rnams bsdu bar gyur nas ni/ /de ltar 'khor lo mchog

rnams spro/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i lha/ /'khor lo mngon sum mthong gyur ba/ /phyi nas bris par gyur pa yang / /ji bzhin bsod nams brtag pa'o/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /rdo rje sgra chen de dang des/ /thig gis thig gdab legs par gnas/ /mtha' yas zhing na

thub dbang zla ba rnams/ /'dir ni sems can don gyi dus la bab/ /thog mar sngags pa yi dgas blta/ /'khor lo sa yi byang du gnas/ /nam mkha'i sa la gdab bya ste/ /blo ldan thig ni g.yon pas bskor/ /oM badzra sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ /phyogs bcu 'jig

rten khams bzhugs pa/ /sems can don phyir de bzhin gshegs/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma'i/ /lha mo'i thig gi sgra yis bskul/ /shar du gnas nas nub bltas te/ /tshangs thig gnyis pa yang gdab po/ /me ru gnas nas nub tu zhal/ /lho yi phyogs su thig

gdab po/ /nub phyogs gnas nas shar du blta/ /byang gi phyogs kyi thig gdab po/ /bskor nas slob dpon rlung gnas te/ /lho ru mngon par phyogs gyur nas/ /nub kyi cha ru legs par gdab/ /byang du mngon phyogs sngags pa ni/ /me yi gnas su rnam gnas te/ /shar gyi cha yi

thig brtsam mo/ /dbang ldan mer gnas rnal 'byor pa/ /mtshams kyi thig ni gdab par bya/ /phyogs la sogs pa'i dbye shes nas/ /thig gdab pa ni legs par brtsam/ /tshangs thig dang po dbus su ni/ /thig bzhi rnams ni gdab par bya/ /thugs dang gsung dang sku 'khor lo/ /

rdo rje phreng ba la sogs bya/ /kha sbyor dbus su ri mo lnga/ /blo dang ldan pas zlum por bya/ /ri mo bzhi po gzhan rnams ni/ /rdo rje phreng ba la sogs bya/ /dma' bas nad de chad pas zad/ /yo bas dngos grub med par 'gyur/ /g.yas su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /slob ma rnams ni

brlag par 'gyur/ /'khor lo nyis 'gyur ring ba ste/ /sgo yi nyi shu'i char gyur pa/ /he ru kar bdag 'dug nas ni/ /thig skud kyis ni thig gdab po/ /zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i lha mo rnams/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba

sogs pas bskor/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /'phan dang me tog phreng bas bskor/ /mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad

pa lte bar bcas/ /phyi rol rdo rje phreng bas bskor/ /'phro ba'i rdo rje'i tshogs sprul ba'o/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad legs par bri/ /dngos grub kun dang yon tan gzhi/ /phyi rol du ni nag pos bskor/ /ming ni mkha' spyod ces bya'o/ /rtsibs brgyad la sogs 'khor lo ste/ /pad+ma'i ka ba'i

phreng gis bskor/ /sa 'og gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /'khor lo'i phreng bas dang por bskor/ /rtsibs kyi mtshams su rdo rje ni/ /mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pa yis bri/ /'khor lo phreng ba'i mthar thug par/ /'bar ba'i ri mo de bzhin no/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /'khor lo'i

dbus su legs gnas nas/ /hi sgrogs khro bo'i lta ba yis/ /de nas sgo ni dbye bar bya/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /kha khyer dag ni yangs pa'o/ /sgo khyud dang ni sgo yi tshad/ /lha yi snam bu'ang de bzhin no/ /kha khyer kun nas sgo yi phyed/ /'gram dang logs dang de bzhin

no/ /dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang / /'phan dang me tog phreng bas spras/ /tshon gyi sa ni de yi phyed/ /rtsa ba'i thig gi sa yi rgyab/ /rdo rje la sogs ka ba yi/ /sa ni tshon gyi sa dang mnyam/ /rta babs sgo las sum 'gyur te/ /'phan dang dril bu dang ldan pa/ /dril bu rlung gis bskyod pa yi/ /'phan

ni phyi rol mtshams su'o/ /dang por nam mkha'i thig yin no/ /de yi 'og tu ye shes thig /phyogs kun mnyam par bgrod nas ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yi cho gas gdab/ /lugs byung lugs bzlog pa 'dis ni/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig yin no/ /de bzhin nang gi bdag nyid lus/ /

tshogs pa las byung mgon po yis/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /lhan cig skyes shing rang bzhin dag /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan/ /phyi dang nang gi thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o// //dur khrod rus pa legs par blang / /thal ba lo ma la so phag dang / /ba bla

dag dang ldan pa yis/ /legs bris he ru ka 'khor lo/ /thod par rdul tshon bzhag nas ni/ /blo bzang thig gdab cho gas so/ /'bar ba'i lta bas bkug nas ni/ /ye shes 'khor lo'i snying po gzhug /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /gsang sngags nyid kyis mngon

bsngags te/ /dpal ldan he ru ka rgyal bdag /'khor lo'i dbus su legs par gzhug /dur khrod las byung thams cad ni/ /dbang phyug mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba yis/ /rdul tshon bri ba brtsam par bya/ /lag pa g.yon pas me phyogs nas/ /

blo dang ldan pas g.yon du bskor/ /dkar po ser po de bzhin du/ /dmar mo ljang gu de bzhin nyid/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam ldan zhing / /dpa' bo bzhis ni bskor ba'o/ /dag cing bar du nas kyi tshad/ /ri mo lnga po bri bar bya/ /ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/ /sgo yi nyi shu cha ru ni/ /

mnyam par dgyes pas bri bar bya/ /sbom pas nad ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phra ba yis ni nor zad cing / /yon po yis ni rnam par sdang / /chad pas slob dpon slob ma 'chi/ /g.yas su bskor nas bris pa yis/ /rdul tshon rnams ni mthu med 'gyur/ /lho yi sa ni nag po ste/ /shar ljang de

bzhin byang du dmar/ /nub phyogs sa ni ser po bri/ /gsang sngags rim pas yid 'ong bar/ /dbus su pad+ma'i 'dab ma ni/ /phyogs kyi mdog tu brtag par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo 'byung / /he ru ka yi dkyil 'khor bya/ /sngon po dmar po dkar po che/ /thugs gsung sku yi

'khor lo'o/ /gzhan ma thams cad ci mdzes par/ /phyi rol rta babs bri bar bya/ /lha mo chen mo dang ldan pa'i/ /dpa' bo lte bar dgod par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs yang dag ldan/ /he ru ka rdor 'dab ma la'o/ /de bzhin khra sogs lha mo rnams/ /he ru ka sogs yang dag ldan/ /

sgo dang mtshams kyi cha rnams su/ /sngags pas mnyam par bzhag pas bri/ /phyi rol yi dgas gnas de bzhin/ /srin mo la sogs yang dag ldan/ /'od zer 'phro zhing kha gyes pa'i/ /rdo rje rta babs steng du'o/ /rdul tshon bkye bas rnam mdzes pa'o/ /phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor

bstan/ /bla ma mnyes byas blo ldan pas/ /nang gi bdag nyid rnam shes bya/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sbyor ba yis/ /rdul tshon bri ba skyon yin no/ /lhan cig skyes dga' rol pa yis/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid bri/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs rtsom pa yi/ /rlung la sogs

pa byung ba na/ /he ru ka dpal bdag sbyor bas/ /gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi tshon dgye ba'i cho ga'o// //bu yi thog ma'i ye shes rnams/ /rtsibs su kha dog bzang po gang / /bsam gtan de yi 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo mnyam par dgug /lha

mo'i tshogs ni du ma dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /de nyid yang dag rin chen brgyan/ /gzhan pa'i dpa' bo stobs chen rnams/ /rtag tu rgyud las byung cho gas/ /'khor lo bde mchog blo ldan pas/ /yang na sarba bud+d+ha sogs/ /rgyud las mchod pa'i cho gas mnyes/ /

dkar po ser po de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid/ /gcig tu me tog phyag rgya ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang bzhin/ /rgya skyegs pa bla rams mchog dang / /tshon sna lnga la rjes su bcos/ /dkar po lnga yi rang bzhin rgyas/ /mnyam par mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /

khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang / /de bzhin srog dang rtsa rang bzhin/ /rnam pa sna tshogs dri dang ldan/ /sngon bzhin mnyam par 'grub par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan gnyis dang ri dgas skyes dang ga pur bcas/ /sha la ka dang na ga'i spos ni bu ram ldan/ /las kun rab sgrub spos la sogs/ /

gu gul sa rdza ra dang ga bur dang / /ri dgas las skyes spos rnams ni/ /rdzas 'di rnams ni bcos pa yi/ /mar khus sbar ba'i snang ba bya/ /tsan+dan gur kum pri kwa dang / /ga pur ri dgas las skyes spos/ /bcos shing gdug par grub pa'i ras/ /phyag rgya bzang po'i ras yin no/ /

kak+ko la dang e le dang / /mu sta kaM dang ga pur dang / /ri dgas las byung ba yi dri/ /'di rnams zhib mor btags nas ni/ /seng ldeng ri lur dgod par bya/ /twa ga 'dab ma lo d+ha dang / /ma ri tsa dang ga pur rnams/ /rab tu bsten par bya ba'o/ /sa hA kA ri'i mar khu ldan/ /kha la bsgos

pas zhes su dran/ /de 'og gtor ma'i mchod pa sbyin/ /rnam par bsgyings ma bcos pa'i chang / /chang dang bdud rtsi de bzhin no/ /dpa' bo gcig dang rgun 'bru dang / /glad pa dang ni bi Ta dang / /sh+tse Ti rnams ni de bzhin no/ /lan tshwa la sogs ro rnams kun/ /sha ka ra sogs bdud

rtsi 'dra/ /thams cad bdag nyid ros dngos grub/ /ma lus lus pa med pa sgrub/ /sna tshogs ston mos dngos grub ni/ /chang dang sha dang yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa nye bar longs spyod dang / /skal bzang che mchog rab tu 'grub/ /pa kwa'i 'bras bu pa nas/ /rgun 'bru dang ni

na le ka /a lu ka la sogs pa yi/ /'bras bu'i phyag rgya 'di gtan du/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bur spro/ /sha ka ra dang sbyar rtsir byug /a mra'i rus pa rnams la byug /sa ha ka ri'i mar khu sogs/ /mnyam pa'i dri ru rab tu gyur/ /ji ltar rigs par shun pa sogs/ /ba

bla rgya skyegs kyis btsos te/ /mchod pa'i dus su dbul bar bya/ /lus skyes pa dang yang dag ldan/ /phyi rol mchod pa bdag gis bstan/ /legs par mchod par mnyes byas te/ /phyi rol song ste gtor ma sbyin/ /gcer bu skra grol gyur pa dang / /kha T+wAM ga thogs legs gnas te/ /chang

dang sha dang yang dag ldan/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs la 'bul lo/ /'byung gnas la sogs rnal 'byor che/ /blo dang ldan pas spangs byas shing / /lho ru mngon par phyogs byas te/ /gnas ni mthon por rnam par gnas/ /g.yon pas g.yas pa'i rkang pa mnan/ /gyen du lta bas

bltas nas ni/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /pheM brjod pa yi bdag nyid can/ /oM a ral+li ho dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /oM badzra DA ki nI sa ma ya s+t+waM dr-i sh+ya ho/ /gcig dang lnga dang de bdun du/ /sngon du gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /dam tshig rdzas dang yang dag ldan/ /thod pa'i nang du rnam par

bsam/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen kha dbye/ /phreng ba'i phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug kun/ /lam la gnas rnams mnyes pa'o/ /phyogs skyong yi dgas 'byung po la/ /mnyam par bzhag nas gtor ma sbyin/ /kha kha la sogs sngags 'di yis/ /'dod pa

thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba yak+Sha rA kA sA b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsi un+mA da a pa smAr badzra DA ki n+yA da ya/ /i maM ba'i gr-ih+Na n+tu sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tshan+tu ya the baM ya the Sh+TaM b+hu dza tha pi pa tha mA ti kra ma tha/ /ma ma sarba kArta ya pad+su kha bi shud+d+hA ye sa ha yi kA b+ha ban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ gtor ma

byin nas de'i 'og tu/ /sngags pas spyad dang bza' ba brtsam/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan/ /snying rje'i stobs kyi sbyor ba can/ /rdo rjes mtshan cing khro bo'i gzugs can ro yi kha ni gdangs pa spyi bor zla ba phyed pas bcings/ /yid 'ong dril bu'i sgra yis mdzes shing sna tshogs mang

pos 'phyang ba'i rgyal mtshan tshogs/ /brgyan pa'i drag po'i sgra dang sna tshogs mang po'i me tog gis mtshan phreng ba bcings/ /kha T+wAM ga ni 'bar ba mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa rdo rje rnal 'byor pas gzung ngo / /dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo de rjes bla ma mchog dang he ru ka 'khor mgon po la phyag 'tshal/ /

slob ma bzang po yon tan mchog ldan dang ni mchod pa kun gyi bye brag blangs nas ni/ /g.yas na 'khrol ba'i legs pa'i Da ma ru ni dri med hUM sgrogs dga' ba'i mchog/ /slob dpon rol pa mdzad pas nges par dkyil 'khor khang ba'i dbus su 'jug/ /lho yi sgo ru song nas ni/ /lhag

ma rnams su yongs su bskor/ /lha mo rgyud gsungs rim pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rgyud rigs shar sogs nas/ /lho yi sgo ru 'gro ba ni/ /gang bstan bde bar gsungs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar brtag pa ni/ /kun rdzob don du rtogs par bya/ /phyogs ni mtha' yas cha shas kyis/ /lho la

sogs pa brtags na ni/ /lho yi zhal ni gang yin nyid/ /rnal 'byor pas ni kun rdzob nyid/ /dang por dpa' bo drug dang lha mo'i bkod pa srung ba'i 'khor lo bya/ /sngags kyis mngon bsngags chog ldan pas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa de nas bya/ /bde ba'i stan la 'bad pa yis/ /shes

rab yan lag stan gyi steng / /dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus su ni/ /sngon du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid ldan/ /mdzes pa'i gser dang rin chen kun/ /dkyil 'khor la ni gtor bar bya/ /sha chen po dang yang dag ldan/ /gnas brgyad du ni legs par bdug /mar khu chen po dang ldan

pa'i/ /mar me brgyad ni dbul bar bya/ /me tog sna tshogs rnam par dgram/ /sna tshogs dri yis legs par bsgo/ /sgo bzhi ru ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med gnas/ /lus la phyag rgya lnga la sogs/ /mgo bo lnga yis mtshan pa dang / /gang yang gcer

bu'i gos dang ni/ /chang la dga' bas myos pa'o/ /thams cad ral pa'i cod pan bcas/ /spyad dang bza' ba mchog tu brtson/ /mtshams kyi cha ni gzhan rnams su/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam 'khyud cing / /nu ma 'tshir ba la

brtson pa'o/ /tshogs kyi gtso bo'i bdag po ni/ /dpal ldan 'khor los sgyur legs gnas/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phag mo'i zhal la'o byed pa'o/ /la la glu yis glu len cing / /la la gar byed rnal 'byor pa/ /la la bzhad pa rab tu byed/ /bza' dang spyod pa la chags

pa'o/ /la la rdza yi rnga brdung dang / /bkra shis glu ni sna tshogs kyis/ /'khor lo bde mchog bde ba yi/ /dpa' bo chen po la mchod do/ /thams cad dpa' bo drug dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor mas ni rgyan du byas/ /go cha la sogs yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor legs par gnas/ /

de ltar go bgos bdag nyid ni/ /sum cu gsum pas kyang mi shigs/ /he ru ka la spro byas nas/ /bza' dang ston mo legs par brtsam/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang dpa' bo dang dbang phyug ma la mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /dam tshig 'khor lo drug pa ni/ /ye

shes 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ /sems kyis kha sbyor byas pa ste/ /gyen du lta bas bltas nas ni/ /sngon du spyan drangs phyag rgyar bcas/ /sngags dang pheM sgrogs sbyar ba yis/ /mtha' yas phyogs na bzhugs pa yi/ /lha rnams mnyes nas dngos grub ster/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang

phyug ldan/ /sngon gyi mtshan ma sogs pas brgyan/ /'jig rten mgon po snying brtse can/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gshegs par 'gyur/ /gnyis su med pa'i dngos grub thob/ /dkyil 'khor he ru ka yi zhing / /byin rlabs go 'phang yid 'ong bar/ /byed pa som nyi med pa'o/ /

phyi dang nang gi ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drang pa'i cho ga'o// //phyi dang nang gi sems kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor lo mchod/ /rang 'byung gi ni me tog nyid/ /bu sogs gnas na legs par bzhugs/ /de yis gdong ni bskus nas ni/ /gang yang gzhan pa'i 'khor lor

gnas/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sngags kyis/ /mngon par bsngags nas byin gyis brlab/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags kyis/ /sgo dang sgo ru byin gyis brlab/ /brgyad brgya mchog tu bzlas pa ni/ /mnyam gzhag sngags pa nyid kyis bya/ /A li kA li bzlas nas ni/ /phyi nas

dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab/ /'jigs pa'i sgra ni mang po dang / /'jigs pa'i lha mo'i lus bzang ba/ /khyim lnga yi ni lha mo mchog /byon par gyur nas mdun du bzhugs/ /sgrub pa po la dngos grub ni/ /rgya chen ster bar the tshom med/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ rtag tu de

ni mchi ma 'byung / /bdag nyid las byung zas de bzhin/ /rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed/ /de bzhin gcer bur gyur bas mchod/ /g.yon pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyis/ /'di de phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi rim/ /bza' dang spyad pas yang dag 'grub/ /mgrin pa legs bzung

sgrub pa po/ /rang gnas song nas de mnyes shing / /rnal 'byor ma rnams grub 'dod pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul che rtogs sngags pa ni/ /he ru ka ni mchog tu skye/ /yang na mkha' spyod 'khor lo dang / /sa spyod la sogs yang dag ldan/ /brtse zhing he ru kar gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i don

kun sgrub pa'o/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas zhing bskor nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /yang na bsod nams zhan pa'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor gnas pa ma grub na/ /sems can don la gcig tu brtson/ /bza' dang spyad pa brtsam pa'o/ /bzhad dang sgeg pa la

sogs ldan/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' ba'o/ /sna tshogs sten mos dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod par 'gyur/ /gar gyi bstan bcos thams cad ni/ /byed pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa/ /de ni he ru ka dpal rgya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba/ /nang gi bdag nyid

sbyin sreg gis/ /dpa' bo lha mo legs par mchod/ /dpal ldan bde mchog yang dag langs/ /dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/ /zhi ba'i btung bar gyur pa'i sems/ /rtag pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /zhi ba'i btung ba gzhan ma ni/ /chang dang sha sogs yang dag ldan/ /oM sarba

bud+d+ha DA ki nI sarba b+hak+ShaM sho d+ha ya gu h+ya badzri Ni hUM swA hA/ mngon par bsngags nas byin gyis brlab/ /yang na lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /bza' ba kun sogs rnal 'byor pas/ /shes nas kha zas bza' ba blo ldan rnal 'byor pa mos pas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i

lto ba thab khung lte ba'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad ni/ /lte bar dga' bar 'byung ba shin tu 'jigs pa'i he ru ka yi zhal/ /nges par 'dab mas dkris pa chen po lha mo'i pad+ma thod par ni/ /de yi rjes su 'khor lo gsum dang sgo skyong rnams dang ldan/ /sna tshogs mang ba'i ro ster bgyis pa dpal

gyi bdud rtsi sogs/ /sna tshogs mchog gi sreg rdzas kyis ni phung po'i bud shing rab 'bar ba/ /skad cig gyur pa kun mkhyen me yi rang bzhin la/ /sngags pa bzang pos rtag tu 'di dag der ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /rdo rje nang gi bdag nyid nyon/ /ji ltar sbyin

sreg rab 'grub pa/ /'bar ba chen po gzi brjid che/ /rnam par mi rtog pa ru bsreg /bza' ba btung ba gang cung zad/ /de dag thams cad mkhas pas bsreg /ji ltar bstan pa'i yam shing ni/ /gzugs phung la sogs rang bzhin dag /rnam par mi rtog pa yis bsreg /gang

zhig sems ni rang bzhin kun/ /khu ba khrag dang de bzhin sha /bshang dang gci ba lnga pa ste/ /rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'/ /rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan pas/ /de bzhin nga rgyal gti mug che/ /zhe sdang 'dod chags de bzhin du/ /phrag dog ser sna phra ma ste/ /dam tshig

bsten pa dri ma med/ /de nyid bzang por mnyam sbyor bas/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor lhan cig skyes/ /gtor ma la sogs gang cung zad/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lor sbyin sreg bya/ /mtshan mo skra grol gyur pa dang / /gcer bus phyi rol gtor ma sbyin/ /sngon du bstan pa'i

cho ga yis/ /lam la gnas shing gzi brjid che/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bor ldan/ /gtor ma byin pas mnyes par 'gyur/ /sems can bsam pa dang mthun par/ /phyi rol gyi ni sbyin sreg bshad/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dpal las bstan pa/ /lus kyi 'khor lor sbyin sreg

bya/ /gang phyir lus kyi sangs rgyas ni/ /dam tshig des na de bsreg bya/ /rten dang brten pa pad+ma'o/ /dbus su sbyin sreg bya ba'o/ /sha dang bdud rtsi bza' ba ste/ /chang ni btung bar yang dag ldan/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ phung po'i bud shing sgrib pas brlan zhing g.yogs pa yang / /

ye shes me ni byed pa'i rlung gis bskul bas de/ /du ba 'byung zhing me lce 'bar ba nyid kyis bsreg /khyab cing rgyal ba de ni chos kyi dbyings su mthong / /lus kyi sbyin sreg yang dag ldan/ /phyi rol sbyin sreg gis mnyes te/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs bsten/ /phyi rol sbyin sreg yang dag

brtsam/ /khru gang tsam gyi thab khung gyur/ /thod pa lta bus mdzes pa'o/ /lho ru kha bltas cho ga yis/ /de la kha bltas bskor bas 'grub/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad ni/ /ri yi steng na legs par gnas/ /pad+mar dgra ste de bzhin zhags/ /mdud dang kha T+wAM yang dag ldan/ /khro

bo lta bu shin tu 'jigs/ /rdo rje lte bar dgod pa dang / /phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba bya/ /pad+ma lta bu'i kha khyer bzang / /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dgang gzar dang / /blugs gzar nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /cung zad kha la thod pa 'dra/ /dbus su khro bo'i rdo rje bri/ /A li kA li legs par brjod/ /

'byung gnas la sogs rnal 'byor rig /g.yon du sbyin sreg la sogs rdzas/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pas sbyin sreg bya/ /gnyis med la sogs rgyud chen las/ /mchod pa bya ba'i cho ga yis/ /me dang he ru ka dpal sogs/ /sbyin sreg byas nas yon blang ngo / /mi dang ba lang rnga mo dang / /

ce spyang rta dang glang po yi/ /sha ni dngos grub 'dod pa des/ /rnal 'byor rig pas sbyin sreg bya/ /gsang bar skra grol gcer bu dang / /sngon du spyad cing bza' ba yis/ /dpal ldan bde mchog rnal 'byor ches/ /gtor ma'i las ni legs par brtsam/ /phyi dang nang gi sbyin sreg gi cho

ga'o// //sngags pa rnal 'byor ma lhan cig /lho ru bltas shing lho ru ni/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas slob ma la/ /cho ga yis ni 'di skad smra/ /bu yis nges par rab 'bad pas/ /sdom pa'i mchog rnams srung bar gyis/ /dpal ldan bde mchog las mchog med/ /lhan cig

skyes pas nye bar mtshon/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun byas te/ /yang na gsungs par gyur pa ste/ /ma la sogs pa thod par gnas/ /slob ma'i sdig pa sel ba ste/ /g.yon pa'i lag pas legs par blangs/ /yi ge bdun pa rjes su dran/ /he ru ka yi sbyor

dmigs te/ /nga rgyal bcas pas legs par gnas/ /phag mo dang ni 'o byed pa/ /slob ma kun gyi kha ru ni/ /nus pa 'phrog cing bdud med pa/ /blo bzang [(]kyis [,]gis [)]ni rim par gtor/ /dpa' bo drug sogs sngags kyis las/ /byas nas slob ma shin tu bsrung / mkha' 'gro'i sngags

kyis bsngags pa yi/ /dar dpyangs bcing bar bya ba'o/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /slob mas lho nas gsol ba btab/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa yi/ /skye bo la ni dngos grub ste/ /de nas bla ma'i lag g.yon gyis/ /rtag tu slob ma bzung nas kyang / /lho yi

sgo ru bzhag nas ni/ /po tang gi yi tshig gis dri/ /slob mas kyang ni de nas tshig /pra ti po tang gi kye khyab bdag /he ru ka yis gA ya dri/ /de nas dpa' bos brjod par bya/ /oM shrI he ru kA ya bid ma he bid+yA rA dza ya d+hI ma he swA hA/ 'di ni gA ya dri'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos

grub ste/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i gtso/ /bde mchog gi ni gzhir gyur pa/ /bu khyod kyis ni blang bar gyis/ /lho sgor slob mas 'di skad brjod/ /oM na ma te hUM/ na ma mi hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ zhes so/ /mkha' spyod la sogs rab dbye bas/ /phyag gsum dag ni bya ba'o/ /

thal mo spyi bor byas nas ni/ /yan lag kun gyis phyag bya'o/ /oM sarba bA ri yo gi nI b+h+yaHpU dzo ba s+tha nA ya/ At+ma nAM ni d+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi n+ya tAM DA ki n+yai a d+hi taSh+Thi swa mAM/ g.yon pas thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /snying ga ru ni byas nas ni/ /yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa/ /slob mas sgo kun

la phyag bya/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi nAM pU dza a b+hi She kA ya At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi n+yA t+ma lA mA yi a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ g.yon pa'i thal mo 'phral ba ru/ /byas par gyur nas de nas yang / /byang gi sgo ru brten nas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la phyag bya'o/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi nI/

b+h+yaHpU dza pra brta nA yAt+ma naM ni r+yA ta yA mi/sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi n+yA t+maM khaN+Da ro hA yi pra brtA ya mAM/ sngags pas de nas phyi nas sgor/ /spyi bor thal mo byas nas ni/ /sngon du gsang sngags brjod pa yis/ /dpa' bo he ru kar phyag bya/ /oM sarba bI ra yo gi nI naM pU dza karma Ni

At+mA nAM ni r+yA ta yA me/ sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi n+yA t+maM rU pi N+yai karma ku ru mAM/ phyag bzhi'i cho ga'o/ /lho yi sgo ru song nas ni/ /lho ru bltas nas legs par gnas/ /g.yon pas slob ma bzung nas ni/ /sdom pa'i mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dkon

mchog gsum la skyabs su song / /'dir ni sangs rgyas rigs yid 'ong / /sdom pa brtan por gyur pa'o/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /byang chub sems gang rdo rje ste/ /shes rab dril bu zhes bya'o/ /slob dpon khyod kyis gzung bar bya/ /bla

ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'o/ /sdom pa dam tshig ces su brjod/ /rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni/ /nyi ma re re dus drug tu/ /zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bya/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos ni

khyod kyis gzung / /'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i/ /sdom pa mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /bdag gis brtan por so sor gzung / /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /las kyi rigs chen rtag pa'o/ /sdom pa'i cho ga'o// //bu skyes so sor

gnas par gyis/ /rigs kyi de nyid kun du blta/ /dpa' bo lha mo legs par byung / /he ru ka ltar shin tu mdzes/ /gang gis bskyed pa mkha' ltar stong / /mchog gi go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /he ru ka dpal ye shes de/ /nga yis mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /dkyil 'khor

ma mthong ba rnams la/ /khyod kyis kyang ni smra mi bya/ /gal te smras na bu khyod kyi/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /dpal ldan phag mo khyod nyid kyi/ /snying la yang dag zhugs pa 'di/ /gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral nas gshegs/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu yi

snod/ /slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags bzlas shing / /tshig 'di dag ni brjod par bya/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub 'ong / /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu 'thung shig /oM pany+tsa

amr-i tod ka tha hUM/ ded phan chod khyod kyi dpal phag mo nga yin gyis/ gang nga yis smras pa de 'bad pas bya dgos so/ /khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /khyod ya nga ba ma spangs par dus byas nas/ /dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ /bu yis 'di dag smra bar gyis/ /dpa'

bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag la byin gyis rlob la/ dpal he ru ka la sogs pa bdag la dbab tu gsol/ /gos ngan khrag ni blangs nas ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang gu gul dang / /byi la'i rtug pa yang dag ldan/ /bdug pa byas nas bsngags nas ni/ /thod pa'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /

ro bsregs me yis legs par bdug/ khros shing bsgyings bcas sems dang ni/ /gnyis su med pas bsngags par bya/ /sngon du bstan pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /go cha yan lag de bzhin no/ /slob ma'i lus la blo ldan pas/ /yang ni 'khor lo thams cad gzhug /lte ba'i pad gnas

'khor lo bzang / /gsal zhing 'od dang bcas pa'o/ /rkang pa'i 'og tu rlung gis bskyod/ /slob ma la ni dbab par blta/ /gnyis su med pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /g.yas brkyang stan la yang dag ldan/ /mkhas pas sngon du bstan pa yi/ /bdug pa rnams kyis bdug par bya/ /

oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kro d+ha A be sha hUM/ oM shrI he ru kA ya bid ma he ba bir+yA dza ya d+hi ma he swAhA/ zhes bya bas dpa' bo rab tu bskul la/ de yi lag nas lag pas bzung / /mig phye nas ni bstan par bya/ /dpal ldan phag mo da khyod kyis/ /mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad/ /thams cad

mig ni 'byed gyur pa/ /rdo rje mig ni bla na med/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye hUM phaT swA hA/ dad pa'i shugs kyis da lta ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la blta bar gyis/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /me tog gtor ba la

bltas te/ /stan sogs gnas na legs par gnas/ /gang du me tog ltung ba de/ /de la dngos grub 'gyur ba'o/ /phyi rol dbab pa'i cho ga'o/ /rnal 'byor kha cig phyi rol 'dod/ /bdag gi bla ma'i dbab pa'i lugs/ /bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bya

ba'i cho ga ni/ /cung zad bsgoms pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma yi lus kyis gsungs/ /lus kyi rin chen bskyod pa ni/ /skad cig gis ni rang bzhin 'phar/ /rnal 'byor bzang pos 'das pa'i rigs/ /ma 'ongs pa yang mthong bar

'gyur/ /dbab pa'i cho ga'o// //he ru ka dang gnyis med gnas/ /dpa' bo che la bu yis ltos/ /pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha mo bzhi/ mchod pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can/ /sgo skyong la sogs rnams kyis srung / /blo gros chen po dbus gnas pa'i/ /

'khor lo bde mchog bde ba'i mchog /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te/ /slob ma gus shing yid 'ong bzang / /g.yon pa thal sbyar snying gar gzhag/ /dbang skur don du gsol ba gdab/ /he ru ka dpal dbang skur ba/ /'gro ba skyob phyir gzi brjid can/ /rdo rje sems dpas

ji ltar byin/ /de bzhin bdag la deng gsol cig /lho yi sgo ru rab zhugs nas/ /he ru ka sogs bdag sems la/ /seng ge'i stan la gnas pa yi/ /sna tshogs pad+ma la 'phan sogs/ /slob ma phyag rgya lnga dang ldan/ /kha T+wAM ga brten legs par gnas/ /steng du

gdugs bzang lha mos gzung / /Da ma ru ni lag na thogs/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' tshogs kyis/ /bskor nas dbus su bsgyur nas ni/ /glu la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyis/ /'bad nas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /thog mar gnas pa'i dngos grub don/ /blangs nas sngags dang yang

dag ldan/ /gsang sngags rig pas dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma tshogs 'khor lor gtor/ /de nas dgyes pas langs nas ni/ /dpa' bo he ru ka dpal sogs/ /dbang bskur rin chen chen po yi/ /gnyis med chu ni ster bar byed/ /he ru ka yi bka' thob nas/ /thog mar snying

po bzlas pa yis/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /gzhan dag tu ni bzhad gad 'gyur/ /nus pa med gyur rnal 'byor ma'i/ /snying ga'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer gyis/ /slob ma'i lus la bkang nas ni/ /dbang bskur sbyin pa bsam par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bcu bzhi ni/ /

sngon gyi rnal 'byor pas gang bstan/ /rgyas pa dgos pa med pa'i phyir/ /thams cad bdag gis ma bris so/ /bskyed pa rnal 'byor rgyud du'o/ /rdzogs pa rnal 'byor ma yi rim/ /bdag gis de bgros rdzogs pa yi/ /rim pa 'di ni rab tu bsgrags/ /yungs kar 'od zer du ni

bstan/ /gang phyir des ni legs bskul ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rol pa 'di lta bu/ /bdag nyid chen po phab nas ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin te/ /brtan g.yo kun gyi bdag nyid do/ /des na thog mar dbang bskur lnga/ /bde zhing 'byor pa sbyin par bya/ /'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /

dbang bskur skad cig gis rdzogs so/ /gang phyir 'gro dbang ngo bo ste/ /de phyir dbang bskur sbyin mi bya/ /mi shes de nyid mi rig ste/ /de yang de nyid rang bzhin no/ /rdzogs pa'i ye shes bskyed pa ni/ /yang ni smra bar bya ba'o/ /thog mar chu ni sbyin par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis

bsngags/ /phyi nas dbu rgyan sbyin par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rim pas so/ /ji lta ba bzhin du gsungs pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nam/ /de bzhin srog dang rtsa rang bzhin/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan te/ /rdo rje gtsug gi nor bu thod/ /sna tshogs kun gyi bla ma dang / /

thams cad kun gyi slob dpon phyir/ /ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing / /rgyal srid thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin pad+ma gcig /sna tshogs kyis mdzes de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i dbang bskur bas/ /slob ma thams cad dbang bskur te/ /gsang sngags 'di

nyid brjod par bya/ /oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badzra bar+Na nI ye hUM phaT swA hA/ snying gar gnas pa'i thugs rdo rje/ /de rjes kyang ni dbang bsgur te/ /bdag nyid he ru ka rdor che/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig 'di brjod/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dbang bsgur bas/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya/ /dpa'

bo kun du rab 'grub phyir/ /rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / /rdo rje dril bu'i lag pa yis/ /he ru ka yi sbyor bas 'khyud/ /de yi g.yas pa'i brla steng du/ /g.yon pa'i byin pas mnan pa'o/ /oM he ru ka a d+hi pa ti twAM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha bI ra sa ma ya staM/ bdag pa'o/ /oM shrI he ru ka

a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi shrI he ri ka nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ yang na rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /lha mo rgyud las thams cad du/ /de ming rnal 'byor ma lung bstan/ /de nyid rig pas sbyin par bya/ /oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti twaM a b+hi Sha ny+yA mi shrI he ru ka nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ gdod nas chos

la ming med de/ /kun rdzob tu ni ming du grags/ /dam pa'i don gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /ming med ming dang ldan pa'ang med/ /shin tu rnam dag chu yin te/ /mnyam pa nyid ni dbu rgyan gyur/ /rdo rje rtag tu so sor rtog /bdag po dam tshig las byung ba'o/ /brtul zhugs lung

bstan dbugs dbyung ba/ /dpal ldan rnam snang gtso bo'o/ /dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan/ /bum pa'i dbang du rnam par bstan/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /he ru ka yi phyag na gnas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /he ru ka yi brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba

bI ra twaM sid+d+hi badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sha s+t+waM d+ha ra yA mi hi hi hi hi hUM/ rdo rje brtul zhugs de byin te/ /de yi rdo rje sbyor bas bzung / /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /dril bu

de nyid gzugs kyis ni/ /rnam par mkhas pas de la sbyin/ /'di de rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/ /shes rab dbyangs ni rjes su dran/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba zhes/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos byas pa/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i

sems dpa' yis/ /dam pa'i srid pa byed pa'o/ /dpa' bo chen po chen po sbyin/ /kha T+wAM ga mchog gzung bar gyis/ /he ru ka dpal sku yan lag /brtan g.yo'i bdag nyid kun yan lag /bu yis rtag tu dam du ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas gzung bar gyis/ /thod pa'i phreng ba yang

dag ldan/ /dbu rgyan mchog tu gzung bar gyis/ /gar dang glu dang de bzhin phreng / /dri dang bdug pa de bzhin te/ /'di dag lhan cig skyes par grags/ /'khor dang shin tu mdzes pa'o/ /me long ye shes me long dang / /dung ni de bzhin bde ba'o/ /mig sman

bde ba ces byar gsungs/ /sems can kun la rab tu bskur/ /phyi rol gyi ni bum pa 'di/ /slob dpon thams cad bzhed pa'o/ /bum pa gzhan ni lhan cig skyes/ /lus la rtag tu gnas pa'o/ /ka ni byang chub ces su gsungs/ /'bar ba ldan par gang zhig gyur/ /de ni bum pa

zhes su bstan/ /sems can kun la legs par gnas/ /bum pas legs par dbang bskur bar/ /sems can thams cad som nyi med/ /bla ma'i man ngag rim med pas/ /bum pa shes par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bar nus pa 'khor lo dbus su kun gyi snying po ni/ /bla ma dang ni rnal

'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i 'khor lo la gus kyis/ /skye bo ngan pa'i tshogs dang gdug pa'i sems sogs spongs/ /lhan cig skyes par 'byung ba'i sems dang he ru ka yi rdo rje khyod nyid do/ /bum pas dbang bskur slob ma yis/ /nam mkha' lding gi tshul gnas la/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis

smra bar bya/ /bgrod dang mi bgrod sogs mtshan nyid/ /zhi dang rgyas sogs gang cung zad/ /ral gri mig sman rkang mgyogs dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub pa gang / /las de thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /nang par sngar langs sems dag nyid/ /thams cad lus la byas nas ni/ /bgrod

dang mi bgrod gang cung zad/ /kun la sbyar bas bya ba'o/ /lus kyi sdug bsngal yongs spangs nas/ /dam tshig dang ni sdom pa bzung / /bde mchog gis ni byin pa bzhin/ /bu yis rtag tu sbyin par bya/ /rgyal dang stong dang de bzhin gang / /phyogs ni gnyi ga la de bzhin/ /rnal 'byor

ma dang dpa' bo mchod/ /rang nyid kyis ni 'bad nas mchod/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug tshogs/ /chad la dga' bas rol bar bya/ /'khor lo bde mchog dkyil 'khor du/ /bu khyod kyis ni rtag tu rol/ /dpa' bo phyogs la rab 'bad pas/ /lag pa'i brda ni sbyin par bya/ /

dpa' bo dam tshig shes nas ni/ /de dang lhan cig bza' zhing spyad/ /theg pa dman la dga' ba ni/ /bzang pos nam yang mi bya'o/ /'khor ba dag kyang mi gtong zhing / /mya ngan 'das rtag dga' mi bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs/ /gnod pa'i bsam pa mi bya'o/ /dpa'

bo spyod pa'i brtul zhugs blta/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu bzlas/ /bde mchog mnyes pas dngos grub tu/ /'gyur bar the tshom med pa'o/ /de nas 'bad pas skyong ba ni/ /dam tshig grub pa the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig bskyang ba yis/ /spyod cing mos par 'gyur ba'o/ /bskal pa

mtha' yas brgya yis kyang / /nyams par gyur pas mi 'grub po/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la/ /dngos po kun gyis phyag byas nas/ /khyab bdag khyod kyis ji ltar bstan/ /kun mkhyen bdag ni bgyi bar 'tshal/ /sdom pa bskyang ba'i cho ga'o/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sems kyis ni/ /

mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /tshangs par spyod pas brtags nas ni/ /'dod pa lnga la spyad par bya/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas/ /ji ltar 'dod pa yid kyis bsten/ /he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che/ /bsams nas thams cad rab tu brtag /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /yan

lag thams cad mkha' 'gro'i gnas/ /de bas kun nas rab 'bad bya/ /bdag nyid he ru ka mchod do/ /'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi/ /khams gsum na ni sdig gzhan med/ /de bas chags dang chags bral bar/ /khyod kyis gzung bar mi bya'o/ /dam tshig bsrung ba'i cho ga'o/ /

g.yas pas chos gos bzung nas ni/ /g.yon pas mchog sbyin legs gnas dpa' bo yis/ /nam mkha' lding ltar gnas pa'i slob ma dngos po kun byas te/ /'di ltar nga yis lung bstan khyod/ /he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa mchog tu dag pa'i phyir/ /srid pa ngan

'gro rnams las 'don/ /shrI he ru ka ni rma Nata thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu ba swa/ don yong grub pa'i phyag rgya chen por rnam par gnas pa'i thabs 'dis/ mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas rgyal ba rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu lung bstan pa ste de he ru kar 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan pa'i cho

ga'o/ /khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por brtan pa dang / /di ring bdud las rnam rgyal zhing / /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /dbang 'di bskur ba tsam gyis ni/ /deng ni sangs rgyas nyid du ni/ /thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /

chu dang dbu rgyan rgyu mthun te/ /rdo rje bdag pos mtshon pa smin/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dbang skyes bu ste/ /gsang bar sbyor ba dri ma med/ /ma dang bu mo sring mo dang / /tsha mo nyid de pho nya mo/ /gtum mo dang ni gar mkhan nam/ /gzhan ma la yang sems sbyin te/ /de rnams nang nas

me tog ldan/ /sngags pa bzang pos gzung byas te/ /dbang skur ba la spro ba che/ /rgyud kyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /dpal ldan me tog sha lnga dang / /pad+mar gnas byas blo bzang bas/ /phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor du/ /rgyud bsrungs bsrung bar the tshom med/ /phyag rgya drug

dang thal bar ldan zhing gos dang bral ba skra grol phyag rgya ni/ /phyag rgya g.yon na kha T+wAM ga ste g.yas na Da ma ru ni dri med dkrol ba yi/ /mdun gyi phyogs su blangs nas brla g.yon dbus su slob ma mkha' lding kha byas te/ /bza' ba legs gnas rab mchog bla ma mchog gis zla ba'i

'dod pa bya/ /rnal 'byor ba yis spros par gyur pa gang zhig dri med de ni lce yis rab blangs nas/ /de nas de yi thod par rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal gyis slob ma la ni gsang ba sbyin/ /pad+ma la gnas mchog tu dga' bar 'byung zhing snying por gyur pa khyod kyis lce yis long / /de nas lag nas

bzung ste cho ga bzhin du skyon med rnal 'byor ma ni de la sbyin/ /lha mo 'di ni dngos grub ster/ /khams lnga bcud kyi bdag nyid can/ /he ru ka bdag sbyor ba yis/ /bde la legs par myang bar gyis/ /bu kye mdun du dga' bas mtsho skyes mchog ni dga' bas brtan par 'khyud/ /

tshig med brjod du med pa gang zhig legs pa'i mthu ni bde mchog rang bzhin snying po'o/ /gzhan pa thams cad ji ltar bstan pa bde ba skyes pas dga' ba'i ngo bo la sogs de/ /shes par byas nas phyis ni ji ltar 'dod pa bya zhing nyin dang mtshan du de nyid rin chen bsgom/ /lha mo'i mtshan

nyid mngon du bstan pas rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis smra bar bya/ /dpa' bo khyod ni ci la spro/ /pad+ma las byung bza' ba dang / /dga' ba bzhi po gang yin dang / /de yang mi phyed legs pa'i blo/ /nus sam he ru ka yis smros/ /slob mas kyang ni de nas smra/ /rtag tu bdag gis byed par nus/ /

pad+ma rgyas pa mgu ba yis/ /dag pa'i sems la smra bar bya/ /pad+mar ji ltar bya bar gyis/ /bde mchog mnyes pa la sogs pa/ /'jigs dang ngo tsha rtag tu thong / /bde ba'i mchog la rol bar gyis/ /slob dpon gyis ni ji ltar bstan/ /blo bzang gis ni de kun ni/ /sangs

rgyas bzhi yi stan la gnas/ /rdo rje pad+ma legs par gnas/ /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /rim pa nyid kyis rjes su spyad/ /de 'og 'byung ba legs bza' zhing / /bla ma rnal 'byor ma phyag bya/ /rdo rje snying po dben par mnyam pa'i

ro la rab tu dga' bas he ru ka yis bya/ /lha mo'i tshogs ni dpa' bo dang bcas mang po'i ro dang bcud ni khro dang sgyu las rnam par grol/ /pad+ma la gnas sbyor ba'i sems ni mchog tu dga' bar 'byung ba zla ba'i 'od rang bzhin/ /gcig tu rol pa la chags snying po lhan cig skyes

pa'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /dga' ba dang bcas dpa' bo mgon pos nges par bzhi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs/ /de ni kun mkhyen rang bzhin sa gsum dang bcas bde mchog snying po'o/ /lhag ma'i brtul zhugs la sogs sbyin zhing bde mchog tu sbas gang yin sems ni bde

bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma yis gsang ba'i mtshan nyid nges par rgyud kyi snying pos nges par brdar bstan bya/ /rnal 'byor sems kyi mtshan nyid ni/ /bde mchog gzhi las ma shes na/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs ci yi don/ /sems can la bstan ci yi don/ /don 'di dag dang yang dag ldan/ /

dbang bskur ba ni rnam pa bzhi/ /dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud las ni/ /ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin gsungs/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no/ /shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa de nas yang de bzhin/ /dpal

ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud las mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /legs par bsngags pa'i dngos grub gsungs pa lhan cig skyes mi gnas/ /dpal ldan bde mchog rgyud du thog mar lhan cig skyes pa'i sems ni rnam par bkod/ /blo dang ldan pas

mngon du brda yis bstan pas go bar bya/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bar 'khor bar thams cad rnal 'byor pa ni rtag tu 'gyur/ /de nyid du ni sngags dang phyag rgya lhan cig skyes par chog tha dad gsungs/ /lhan cig skyes pa he ru kar brjod pa'i/ /dga' ba bstan pa mi shes ni/ /de ni

bde mchog phyi rol 'khor/ /de ni dngos grub shin tu ring / /rtag pa'i dus su bde mchog gang / /'dus pa zhes byar des gsungs so/ /'dus pa dang ni bde mchog dag /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar gnas/ /'dus pa zhes bya chogs bstan/ /'khor lo bde mchog de

las byung / /'dus pa bde mchog ces bya ste/ /de kun he ru ka ru brjod/ /gang zhig bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa thog med sangs rgyas te/ /rang rig chogs rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /rdo rje pad+mar 'byor pa rgyu las ma skyes dpal ldan 'di ni he ru ka bcas mgon par

gyur/ /yon tan kun gnas rgyud las ni/ /'di yi don ni legs par gsungs/ /he ru ka dpal legs sbyor ba/ /'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa po/ /pha rol yan lag ces grags pa/ /gang yin slob ma dbang bskur ba'o/ /de nyid lhan cig skyes yan lag /ces pa rnal 'byor

ma lus grags/ /lhan cig skyes ma gzugs can ma/ /yan lag phyag rgya 'di spangs nas/ /gang zhig yang dag rig 'dod pa/ /gzhan du sdug bsngal skal ba can/ /ji ltar chags pa'i cho ga yin/ /bde mchog las ni sems can 'dzin/ /lhan cig skyes dga' stong pa nyid/ /

'khor ba na ni mchog yin no/ /de gsungs pa/ rdo rje bdag po thams cad kyis/ /'dod chags de nyid don bsam zhing / /'dod chags las skyes byang chub bya/ /sems can kun la phan pa yi/ /sngags pas khong du chud don 'di/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs su 'dod/ /de kun rtogs

pa'i blo yis ni/ /cho ga yis ni las bya'o/ /grub pa'i dam tshig sdom pa ni/ /'di ni rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis legs par gsungs/ /gnang ba'i mchog 'di brtag pa'o/ /gang gsungs pa/ 'bras bu 'byung ba mang po rgyas pa ni/ /gsang sngags smra bas

bstan pa ni/ /sems kyi sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis/ /sems las rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byung / /de gsungs pa/ byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu gang / /de ni sangs rgyas ye shes mchog /rdo rje he ru ka 'di mngon du 'gyur/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa yi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma

rnams gzugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gis sems/ /lhan cig skyes byas mnyes nas ni/ /gsang sngags zlos la mchog tu brtson/ /rdul tshon lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /legs mchod nas ni gshegs su gsol/ /rdul tshon bag tsam don byin nas/ /chu bo chen po

sogs par 'dor/ /de nas dpa' bo lha mo rnams/ /mtshan mo phyed nas mkhas pa yis/ /spyad dang bza' ba sngon byas te/ /rgyud nyid kyis ni mchod pa bya/ /dkyil 'khor sa yi gnas su ni/ /'ongs par gyur nas bla ma mchod/ /phyi dang nang du yang dag ldan/ /'dod pa lnga la nye

bar spyod/ /he ru ji bzhin lha mo bzhin/ /bla ma yang ni de bzhin no/ /he ru lha mo bla ma la/ /mchod pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba'o/ /de nas bla ma la dbul ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gsungs pa'i yon/ /gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang / /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ras ni zung

gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta dang yul 'khor dang / /rna rgyan dang ni lag rgyan dang / /mgul rgyan sor gdub dam pa dang / /gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /rang gi chung ma bu mo dang / /bran dang bran mo sring mo rnams/ /phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya/ /dngos po kun gyi

bdag nyid kyis/ /blo dang ldan pas bla mar rab dbul bya/ /deng nas brtsams te bdag bran du/ /khyod la bdag ni phul ba lags/ /de ltar cho ga de byas nas/ /sgrub pa po yis shin tu nges/ /de nas de dang de yi ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor ba'o/ /DA ki nI dang lA ma dang / /

khaN+Da ro hA rU pi Ni/ /'di dag 'gro bar rnam par spyod/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang sgrub por bcas/ /thams cad de yi bran bzhin du/ /sgrub pa po ni so ma nyi med/ /sbyor ba grub par gyur pa de'i/ /'jig rten gsum gyis mi bzlogs so/ /slob dpon lus su gnas nas

ni/ /'bad pa yis ni mchod pa len/ /'di don bdag gis rab tu bstan/ /bla ma la ni mchod pa bya/ /he ru ka sogs bde mchog la/ /dngos po kun gyis legs mchod pa/ /rdzogs par gyur nas mkhas pa yis/ /de yi 'og tu spyod pa bya/ /dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o// //

yang na yid ni mngon dga'i gnas su 'khor lo'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /dbang bskur don du yid 'ong ba yi 'khor lor cho ga thams cad byas/ /sngon du bstan pa'i rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sngags pas zas bzang po yi rgyan dang cho ga ni/ /sngon du bstan pa'i de 'dra'i slob ma

la ni dbang bskur sbyin/ /gnas der rnal 'byor pa ni dang po'i dpa' bo dang ni dbus dang g.yon par ldan/ /g.yon pa'i spyod pa'i cho gas shin tu mdzes pa thams cad rtag tu sbyin/ /shin tu rgyud du sngas pa'i dga' ba bzhi yi cho ga legs par bstan/ /snying rje'i stobs ni lhan cig skyes

par legs gnas bshad par gyis/ /pad+ma'i nang na mchog gi sna yi rtse mo ru/ /rdo rje las byung 'o ma rgya mtsho gzugs ni yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun rang bzhin no/ /dpal ldan bde mchog rig pa rtag tu 'bab/ /gtor ma'i cho ga bsrung 'khor lo/ /kha sbyor grol ba bzang po dang / /

sngags btu ba dang de bzhin bsrung / /spobs pa dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs te/ /de dag thams cad yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon des ni bstan par bya/ /de yi lag tu 'ongs pa'i dpal/ /'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba'o/ /dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rgyud du bden sbas gyur pa'i dbang

bskur shes/ /slob ma la ni bla ma des ni rgyud du de bzhin gsungs/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i cho ga'o/ /legs par rab gnas cho ga 'di/ /gdod nas dag pa skyon med pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor kun dang yang dag ldan/ /rnam pa kun gyis legs par dkris/ /

gang phyir 'gro ba sems las byung / /lhan cig skyes pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /de yi phyir na gnas kun du/ /blo bzang gis ni rab gnas kyis/ /lugs ma dang ni glegs bam ni/ /'jig rten don du rab gnas gsungs/ /'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas/ /mkhas pa yis ni rab

gnas bya/ /nye ba'i snying pos ri lu grub pa de yi yul la lhag par gnas pa gsungs/ /de ni bgrod nas sngags pa bzang pos rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus bya/ /zla ba'i btung ba sngon byas nas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dpa' bo'i srung ba yang dag ldan/ /rab tu

'jug lam la legs gnas/ /A li kA li legs brjod nas/ /lha rnams lhag par gnas par bya/ /lugs ma glegs bam la sogs rnams/ /de kun rab tu gnas par bya/ /a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e ai/ o au/ aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga /

tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH /rnam rgyal bum pa bzlas pa yis/ /mkhas pas lha yi khrus bya'o/ /de nas bum pa gzhan gyis kyang / /dngos grub rgyur ni dbang bskur ro/ /rnal 'byor chung ngu rdo rje sems/ /de lta

bur ni mtshan nyid gyur/ /cho ga thams cad bya ba ste/ /rgyud las ji ltar bstan pa 'dod/ /'das pa bar ma'i sbyor ba yis/ /rten la bar ma'i cho ga bya/ /rab gnas la sogs gang yin kun/ /gang bstan pa ni de bzhin gsungs/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ldan bdag /dpa' bo'i

yid ni mi g.yo ba'o/ /chen po'i yon tan dang ldan pas/ /sems tsam nyid du kun la spyad/ /skad cig gis ni thams cad nyid/ /rab tu gnas par nges par gyur/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags/ /chen po yang ni chen po yi/ /rnal

'byor gnyis med mtshan nyid do/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo kun gyi gzhi/ /rang 'byung bde mchog las byung ba'o/ /rnam pa bzhir gyur rnal 'byor pa/ /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid dang / /mtshan nyid bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mchod/ /zla ba'i btung ba la

sogs bya/ /bzhad dang sgeg pa la sogs ldan/ /mtshan mo dga' ba chen pos der/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ldan/ /'dus pa la sogs legs brten nas/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga mchog /rtag tu g.yon du bsgyur ba yis/ /blo dang ldan pas thams

cad bya/ /rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'o// //dpal ldan bde mchog 'khor lo che/ /bde mchog lta bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /bcangs na bde mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /e lta bu yi dbus phyogs su/ /dpal ldan mkhas pas gsang sngags rgyal po bri/ /gro gur gum tsan+dan sogs/ /cho gas

dpal ldan ngang pa'i rgyal po nyid/ /gnod pa kun sel rgyal byed legs pa'i dpung par rtag tu bcing / /gsang sngags sna tshogs bzlas shing cho gas dngos grub ster/ /zhi la mtha' ru swA hA bri/ /rgyas pa la ni phyag 'tshal te/ /dbang la hoHdang yang dag ldan/ /bsad la hUM phaT sbyar

bar bya/ /he ru ka sbyor mi shes na/ /sems can don la brtson par gnas/ /dub cing ngal ba de rnams kyi/ /sems can don du mi 'gyur ro/ /sgrub thabs gtor ma sbyin sreg dang / /rab gnas dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/ /'di dag thams cad yang dag ldan/ /he ru ka dpal lus mtshan

nyid/ /dpal ldan rin chen ri gnas te/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi rgyur/ /slob dpon dbu ba blo ldan pas/ /dkyil 'khor thabs 'di byas pa yin/ /'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa ha dzA maN+Dal

tri A lo ka sa ha dza nA ma/ /bod skad du/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byed rgyu la sogs rnam par spangs/ /skye 'jig tshogs bral mi gnas pa/ /gnyis med he ru ka dpal la/ /btud de lhan cig skyes

pa bri/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang / /b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang / /byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du bshad/ /ra ni me ru bstan pa ste/ /khrag dang mkhris pa yang dag 'byung / /bad kan gyis ni khyab nas su/ /rdul dang rgyus pa'ang

'byung ba yin/ /de dag gtso bo rlung yin te/ /ha ni kun du 'gro bar brjod/ /rus pa yi ni mtshams rnams su/ /sa bon lngas ni khyab pa yin/ /ra ni rkan la gnas pa ste/ /sa bon bzhi ni bla na med/ /re'u mig dang po'i gnas su ni/ /sa bon lnga las brgyan pa ste/ /ha ni dbyangs yig

drug pa dang / /lnga pa rnam par shes par grags/ /ha zhes bya ba kun nas ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /dngos dang dngos med 'dres gyur te/ /bshang gci bad kan khrag dang ni/ /de bzhin lnga pa khu ba ste/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin lus/ /rus

pa rkang dang khu ba ste/ /pha las skyes par bstan pa yin/ /sha dang khrag dang pags pa yin/ /ma las skyes par rab tu bshad/ /rnam pa gnyis la ril po gcig /gnyis byung las ni du ma'o/ /gcig dang du ma'i tshul las ni/ /rdo rje can du brjod pa yin/ /he ru ka sogs lha yi ni/ /

lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyams dga' ba/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sgo bzhir ldan/ /rang gi yan lag las byung ba'i/ /ka ba brgyad kyis brtan pa yin/ /dngos grub kun du mnyam pas na/ /gru bzhi par ni rab tu grags/ /sku gsung thugs kyi tshul gyis ni/ /gcig nyid 'khor lo

gsum du brjod/ /bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal/ /b+hai ram la sogs tshul bzhin gnas/ /mgo bo'i pad+ma ri rab yin/ /rkang mthil gzhu yi dbyibs kyis ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal/ /gru gsum rked pa'i phyogs nyid na/ /

me yi dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas/ /lto ba zlum po chu zhes brjod/ /snying ga gru bzhi sa zhes brjod/ /sgal tshigs ri rab lhun po'o/ /der ni mgo bo'i char gnas pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dam skyes la/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed yang dag rdzogs/ /byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis/ /

mgo bo'i dbus nas glad pa zhes/ /bya bar grags pa de nyid ni/ /pad+ma'i dbus gyur gang yin pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes byar brjod/ /de yi dbus na yi ge haM/ /mi shigs thig le'i gzugs can te/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i bdag nyid can/ /sa bon gzugs kyis yang dag

gnas/ /de nyid brtan dang g.yor bcas pa'i/ /'gro ba kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /lus can kun gyi gzugs rnams kyi/ /dang por de las skyes pa yin/ /nyin mtshan bdud rtsi 'dzag pas na/ /me ni mnyes par byed pa ste/ /de nyid kyis ni sgra yang phyed/ /des ni dkyil 'khor

yongs rdzogs par/ /'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor zhes bshad de/ /dngos po rnams kyi snying po mchog /de ni len cing 'dzin pas na/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'dod/ /rtsa rnams su ni yang dag 'jug /de yi sgo ni rnam pa gnyis/ /de dag 'dus pa'i dus

su ni/ /lha yi lus su dmigs par 'gyur/ /steng 'og sgo ni rnam gnyis te/ /'og sgor rnam par shes pa nyid/ /steng gi sgo ru khams rnams te/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtsa rnams kun/ /'dus nas 'jug pa bsam par bya/ /lus la rtag tu steng sgor ni/ /rdo rje can ni rgyud du

gnas/ /steng 'og 'khrul 'khor gsum la ni/ /sgo dgu yis ni yang dag sgor/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bye brag gis/ /rnam pa gsum du 'khrul pas na/ /mchog dang bar dang tha ma yi/ /'khrul 'khor gsum du yang dag gnas/ /ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu ste/ /rags pa lnga ni

lhag pa'i lha/ /bu ga dgu yi lam dag ni/ /sgo dgu zhes ni bya bar grags/ /tha ma lus kyi sgo yin te/ /sbom po'i lha ni rnam par sprul/ /gang gis 'di shes sems ldan zhing / /skyes bu rnal 'byor pa zhes bya/ /dus rnams kun du rtag par ni/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad par

gyis/ /rkang med rkang gnyis bzhi sogs la/ /rlung la sogs pa'i bye brag gis/ /dbugs ni rnam pa bzhir gnas la/ /sems gnas pa yi cho gas gnyis/ /thim dang 'jug pa'i cho ga'o/ /thim pa rtag tu gnas pa ste/ /'jug pa 'gro dang 'ong ba yin/ /de ltar gang

gis mi shes pa/ /sems med skyes bu rnal 'byor min/ /me dang de bzhin rlung dang ni/ /dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu/ /'khor lo sems kyi 'pho ba ste/ /steng dang logs dang thad kar sogs/ /gsum pa yid kyi sgo yin te/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis/ /'jug dang 'byung

ba'i sgo yi mchog /gtso bo steng dang 'og ces grags/ /'og sgor rnam par shes pa ste/ /steng gi sgo ru khams rnams su/ /rnam snang la sogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /steng gi sgo nas bskyod nas su/ /de rnams 'og tu yang dag gnas/ /'og tu spyan drangs steng gshegs gsol/ /

spyan drang gshegs gsol tshul gyis ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi sbyor ba yis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas rtag tu bzhugs/ /'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba yis/ /yon tan skyon ni 'phel 'gyur te/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin nyid/ /lhan cig skyes pas grub ste gnas/ /'di ni bcom

ldan rdo rje can/ /tshogs 'di dag gis sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /zla ba bcus ni sa rnams pas/ /sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug yin/ /snying gi dbus gyur pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas/ /de yi dbus gyur dpa' bo ni/ /hUM gi

sa bon mi shigs la/ /kha ba lta bu 'dzag pa ste/ /bA san+ta zhes bshad pa yin/ /lus can rnams kyi snying dga' byed/ /rgod ma'i kha ni me yi gzugs/ /bdag med ti la ka zhes brjod/ /lus kyi rlung gis bskyod nas su/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas 'bar te/ /bA san+ta dang 'dus

pas na/ /bya ba dang ni byed pa'i dngos/ /'di ni ji ltar bde bar rol/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/ /khu ba'i gzugs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /de ma rtogs par bde ba med/ /bde ba spangs na'ang de mi dmigs/ /nus med ltos dang bcas pa'i phyir/ /lha yi sbyor bas bde ba'o/ /

de phyir sangs rgyas dngos min zhing / /dngos po med pa nyid kyang min/ /phyag dang zhabs sogs rnam spangs te/ /don dam bde ba gzugs yod min/ /des na 'gro kun lhan skyes dga'/ /lhan skyes zhes bya rnam par brjod/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /rang bzhin gyis ni

mya ngan 'das/ /dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pas/ /'on kyang tha mal zhen par 'gyur/ /lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bskyed pa tsam du gnas pa yin/ /'di dag rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /bstan pa bla na med pa yin/ /rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang / /byang chub sems ni rin

po che'i/ /snying po len pas dkyil 'khor yin/ /de ni phyi nang sna tshogs kyi/ /khyab bya'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /phyi ni gzugs dang sgra sogs pa/ /dbang po thams cad 'jug pa'o/ /nang gi khu ba la sogs pa/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas su gnas pa ste/ /

phyi dang nang gi de dag nyid/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje can/ /sbom pa dang ni phra gzugs kyis/ /'gro ba sangs rgyas rang bzhin nyid/ /de ni sangs rgyas byang sems kyi/ /dam tshig don du gsungs pa ste/ /tshe 'di nyid du sangs rgyas ni/ /thob pa'ang dkyil 'khor las byung ste/ /nyan thos

rang rgyal de bzhin du/ /tshangs sogs la yang dkyil 'khor skyes/ /'byung gnas sgra tshul nges 'byung rnams/ /dam tshig gcig pa'i spyod yul yin/ /'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba/ /thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas/ /gtsub shing btsubs pa'i sbyor de bzhin/ /sngags

bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan/ /kA li bung ba zhes bshad de/ /bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin/ /kA li nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /rgyu dang rgyu yi gsang 'dzin pa'i/ /lus ni ma lus de las byung / /phung po skye mched khams rnams dang / /

dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi dag /de dag kun las drangs nas su/ /rtsa ba dbus su thim par bya/ /'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis ni/ /sbyor ba'i rdzas ni dbyung bar bya/ /haM ni char ba'i rgyun du brjod/ /dbyangs yig dang po'i sa bon ni/ /de yi dbus su gzung bar bya/ /kA li me tog tshul

du shes/ /rdo rje can gyi lus me tog /'khor ba bskyed pa ma yin zhing / /thams cad kyi ni sa gzhi yin/ /ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho 'dir/ /shes rab chu srin nya la sogs/ /gnyis med 'dam gyi dbus nas ni/ /thabs kyi myu gu skyes pa yin/ /ban+du ka ni rgyas 'dra ba/ /sbrang rtsi bdud

rtsi'i gnas yin no/ /kA li nyid kyang bdud rtsi ste/ /me tog chu ni 'dzin pa po/ /gnyis las skyes pa lus yin te/ /bdud rtsi chu yi cho ga mchog /dang po rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ /rnam pa ltar ni 'byung ba yin/ /reg na dro ba me yin te/ /du bar snang ba rlung yin no/ /zhu bar gyur na chu yin

te/ /gzugs su snang ba sa yin no/ /ye shes rdo rjes byin brlabs pa/ /rnam pa lngar ni rab tu skyes/ /sems can sangs rgyas nyid mod kyi/ /'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs/ /de spangs pa ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /'jig rten de nyid mi shes gang / /dug zos pas ni brgyal bar 'gyur/ /

de nyid shes pas spong 'gyur ltar/ /gti mug spang na mya ngan 'da'/ /dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis/ /skye bo thams cad 'chi 'gyur ba/ /dug gi de nyid shes pa yis/ /dug gis dug ni sel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rlung nad ldan pa la/ /sran ma'i bza' ba sbyin par bya/ /bzlog pas

sman du brtag par bya/ /srid pa srid pa nyid kyis sbyong / /rnam rtog yang dag rtog spangs te/ /ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa/ /slar blugs pa yis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin dngos por rtog pa yang / /de yi tshul gyis dag par 'gyur/ /dper na me yis tshig pa dag /slar la me la bsro bar

bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa/ /'dod chags me nyid bsten par bya/ /skye bo mi bzad pa yi las/ /gang dang gang gis bcings gyur pa/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/ /srid pa'i 'ching las grol bar 'gyur/ /skye bo 'dod chags kyis bcings te/ /'dod chags nyid

kyis grol bar 'gyur/ /slar bzlog pa yi sgom pa yi/ /nang gi mu stegs can gyis min/ /mi shes rmongs pa'i sems can rnams/ /ji srid ye shes rnams spangs te/ /phyi rol dngos po la gnas shing / /rtog pa'i dra bas dkris pa'i tshe/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi/ /phung po gnyis

su brtags pa yin/ /chos ni rang bzhin rnam dag ste/ /skye ba med cing gnas med las/ /mi shes bsgribs pa'i skye bo la/ /sdig dang bsod nams sangs rgyas gsungs/ /drang ba'i thabs su mdzad pas na/ /sdig dang bsod nams gnyis ka yang / /dper na chu yis gang ba'i klung / /rgal

'dod skye bos shing drung ni/ /rtswa sogs bsdus te 'jus nas su/ /rgal te pha rol rgal ba dang / /dor nas bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin chos dang chos min la/ /brten nas 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/ /bde ba'i byang chub thob 'gyur nas/ /chos dang chos min rab tu spong / /de bas

rtog pa'i tshig btang ste/ /zab mo'i chos la 'jug par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i lam/ /lam rig pa ni rtog mi 'gyur/ /rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed yin/ /mi rtog ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /mkha' bzhin dri ma

med par 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni snyoms zhugs las/ /sku gsung thugs 'dus ye shes kyis/ /ye shes can ni tshe 'di la/ /nga rgyal gyis ni rnam pa kun/ /spangs nas rgyal ba'i gzugs rdzogs 'gyur/ /mi shes pa yi sprul pa yi/ /sna tshogs las las yang dag skyes/ /skyes pa bud

med gzugs mi smad/ /sku yi rdo rje dam tshig yin/ /sems kyi rdo rje smad mi bya/ /ngan rtog dra bas bcings pa yi/ /sems can sna tshogs bskyab pa ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin/ /brlang dang rtsub dang mi mnyan pa'i/ /tshig dag smra bar mi byed cing / /mnyan na bde bar smra

byed pa/ /gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin/ /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /chags pa'i gtam ni rnam pa du ma smra/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor lam ngan ston pa dag /lam yang ma bshad 'ching ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /de nas gang gi tshe rig pa grub pa'i sgrub pa por gyur pa'i tshe

rtags 'di dag 'byung ste/ /sa chen po g.yo zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra grags pa dang / /phyogs thams cad du 'od chen po bskal ba'i me lta bu 'byung ba dang / /bdud kyi gnas rnams su cha lang lta bu'i sgra grags pas skar mda' gtong zhing rgya mtsho chen po 'khrug pa dang / /rdo char 'bab pa dang /

phyag rgya'i snying po can gyi ye shes kyi me 'bar bas bsgyings shing khams gsum po snang bar mdzad de/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa phyogs skyong chen po rnams dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang / /mtsho sman la sogs pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams lhags te me tog dang rol mo sna tshogs pa'i sgra rnams kyis nam

mkha' la gnas te mchod cing / /mtsho sman dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo rnams glu len cing gar byed la/ mi'am ci la sogs pa rnams dga' zhing rtse la rgyal bar gyur cig pa'i sgra 'byin to/ /lha rnams kyi legs pa'i sbyin pa dang / dga' ldan nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams gus par

phyag dang me tog gi char 'bebs so/ /mdor na sgrub pa po de la khams gsum na yod pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byed do/ /rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa dang / /gar yang mi 'gro gar mi gnas/ /thog ma dbus mtha' rnam par spangs/ /gnyis med srid gsum snang ba po/ /'gro

kun thams cad shes pa po/ /kun don kun gyi sems kun nas/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par grol/ /yon tan kun gyis rgyan du byas/ /kun phan zhi ba mtshungs med pa/ /rtag 'char mgon skyob rnam rtog spangs/ /dbyibs dang kha dog las 'das pa/ /rgyal po rgyal ba'i spyod yul yin/ /

bshig dka' bas na rdo rje ste/ /nyon mongs gdung sel zla ba yin/ /'jigs pa med pas seng ge ste/ /'jug par dka' bas rgya mtsho yin/ /de la sogs pa sna tshogs 'dus/ /rnal 'byor pa ni de nyid 'gyur/ /rtog pa kun las rnam grol yang / /de nyid gcig tu 'gro don mdzad/ /

mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis ston/ /de ltar khyab par sna tshogs pas/ /rmi lam lta bur gar mdzad de/ /sgrub pas sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin/ /'gro ba'i don ni rab tu mdzad/ /grub dang lung bstan ma thob kyang / /rgyud dang bla ma'i man ngag la/ /brten nas gzhan la phan blos byas/ /'di

las bsod nams gang bsags pas/ /sa gsum skye bo ma lus pa/ /lam la rmongs pa dag gyur nas/ /rnal ma'i lam dang phrad gyur te/ /log lta skye bar ma gyur cig /bskal ba'i snyigs ma rtsod dus su/ /tshul chen rgya mtsho lta bur byung gyur yang / /mig bral long ba rnams ni kha

phyir bltas/ /de bas de la phan phyir brtsams pa yin/ /rnyed dang phrad par dga' bas skye bo rnams/ /dam pa brten la lam la 'bad pa gyis/ /dka' bas 'jug cing gzhan nas rtsol mi dgos/ /lhan cig skyes pas mtshon bya mtshon byed rnams/ /rang la gdod nas grub pa gnas pa

yin/ /de nas mthun pa'i grogs dang lhan cig tu/ /ma yengs brtson pas goms par bya bar 'os/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po dz+nyA na shrIs mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi rgyal po pho brang zhi ba 'od kyis gsol ba btab nas bsgyur pa'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /u lo tsa tuSh+Ta yaTI kA nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgron ma bzhi'i TI kA zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba rdo rje rim las 'das/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa sngon 'gro ba/ /bde mchog sdom pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sbyor bdag

mgon la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de dang gnyis med skal ldan ma/ /sprul pa chos dang longs spyod la/ /gnas pa'i dngos rnams 'joms mdzad ma/ /phag mo de la'ang bdag phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i snying po ni/ /ston byed snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /grol byed rab tu zhi ba

yis/ /bla ma'i zhabs la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud las/ /man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ba/ /nag po zhabs kyis bsdus byas nas/ /sgron ma bzhi po mdzad pa yin/ /brda' yi skad rnams du ma yis/ /rang byung rnams kyis rtogs par dka'/ /rmongs pa

rnams kyis slob dpon du/ /gzung bas nyams pa dag gis ni/ /phyin ci log pa'i chos bstan pas/ /gzhan rnams la yang nyams par byed/ /de lta'i skyon ni bsal bya'i phyir/ /las kyi rdo rje bdag gis ni/ /tshig re'i sna tshogs don gsal ba'i/ /rmongs pa bsal byed TI kA

brtsam/ /de la dang por brjod pa la sogs pa smra bar bya ba yin te/ gang phyir rigs pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams brjod pa la sogs ma gtogs par 'jug par mi 'gyur bas/ /de'i phyir sgron ma bzhi zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa ni brjod par byed pa'o/ /sngags dang rgyud dang ye shes dang

gsang ba'i lam bstan pa ni brjod par bya'o/ /de dag gi 'brel ba bstan te/ /brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa shas che ba'i skye dgu rnams 'dul ba ni dgos pa'o/ /rtsod pa'i dus su yang myur du byang chub thob pa'i thabs bstan pa ni dgos pa'i dgos

pa'o/ /brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba la sogs pa gleng gzhi'i tshig la brten te/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i rten du gyur pa'i phyag rgya bzhis btab pa'i bcom ldan 'das ye shes lnga dang / /sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid/ /nye bar dmigs pa'i brda gnas kyi khyad par rab tu

bstan pas/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i bsgom pa'i dngos po'i sgo nas kyang / /gnas la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / /sems la dmigs pa thim pa'i rgyur gyur pa/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa/ /sngags kyi sgron ma'i sgra'i bye brag gis/ /slob dpon gyis dran par byed de/ /

ji ltar zhe na/ /i ni las kyi phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba smos te/ /de la las gtsor gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni las kyi phyag rgya ste/ /rang gi lus bshad do/ /chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ yi ge a yin te/ chos thams cad kyi dngos por gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni/ /tsaN+Da lI yin

te/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'byung ba'i rtags yin pa'i phyir ro/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i rlung gi sbyor bas nus pa'i phyir ro/ /slar yang nang gi bshad pa ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pas 'khor lo bzhi bshad do/ /ji skad du/ /a ni sa yi khams yin

te/ /las kyi phyag rgya sangs rgyas spyan/ /thugs rje che zhing thabs che ba/ /sna tshogs gzugs can skyed byed ma/ /'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i bshad pa yang / /las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni

pad+ma'i rtsa a wa d+hU tI'o/ /chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ /byang chub kyi sems kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i a wa d+hU tI'o/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni/ /de dag las bde ba nyams su myong ba'o/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ /la la nA dang / ra sa nA dag gis gzung zhing 'dzin par bya

ba'i don to/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba la yang / /las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ /mdog dmar po ste de nyid de'i gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ /dkar ba yin te/ /chos nyid la des rgyas btab pa'i phyir ro/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni/ /dpe'i tshul can bzhi pa lhan

cig skyes pa bstan te/ /dam pa'i don chen po la des rgyas btab pa'i phyir ro/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni/ /tshul khrims 'chal pa spangs pa las dam tshig grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar phyag rgya bzhi'i mtshan nyid bshad nas/ /sdud pa po'i tshig gi 'brel ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir

ro/ /e waM ma yA shro ta/ /zhes tshig gi 'brel bas/ /'di dag bdag gis thos zhes/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo/ /ro gcig pa'i bdag nyid bdag gis myong zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ /e ni shes rab po zhes bya ba smos te/ /yi ge e'i rnam pa shes rab kyi b+ha ga bshad de/

rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du/ /gang du gtso bo yang dag gnas/ /de ni b+ha gar gsungs pa yin/ /ji srid lus la gnas pa ni/ /de srid las dang las min 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /yang na e ni shes rab ces bya ba ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi

yi ge a'o/ /shes rab kyi ye shes kyi me'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir shes rab tu bshad do/ /yang na chu skyes kyi dbus su rtsa gsum gyi dbyibs kyi tshul can yi ge e shes rab yin te/ gsang ba gsum nye bar dmigs pa'i gnas la btags pa'i phyir ro/ /yang bshad pa ni yi ge e zhes bya ba ni/

bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin can chos nyid bshad do/ /lus dang ngag dang yid gsum de la ma tshang bas te ko na ste shes rab nyid do/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi gzhi ma yin pa'i khungs gsungs te/ /ji skad du/ /gang zhig rnam rtog kun gyi gzhi min tshig gi gzhi ma yin/ /de ni shes rab pha

rol phyin mar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /wa ni thabs so zhes bya ba la/ /yi ge wa ni chu'i sa bon te/ thabs su bstan te/ tshim par byed pa nyid kyis dngos po skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /yang na yi ge wa'i rdzas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i lte ba na gnas pa'i

yi ge ha bshad do/ /bsregs pa rnams gso bar byed pa'i phyir ro/ /ji skad du/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pad+ma/ /rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum dag /rgyas btab rmongs pa thams cad ni/ /thal bar 'gyur ba'ang gso bar byed/ /ces 'byung ngo / /slar yang bshad pa/ /wa zhes bya ba ni/ /yi

ge hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ste skyes bu'i rtags so/ /de nyid thabs kyi yan lag yin pas na thabs su bsten te/ /ma ning la 'dod chags kyi byang chub med pa'i phyir ro/ /slar yang bshad pa/ /wa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang chu skyes dkrugs pa'i dus su rtsa thams cad wa ma na'i phyir ro/ /wa ste thig le'i

gzugs can thabs su bshad de/ /de ni rkyen gyi stobs kyis nye bar 'ongs pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar e waM gyi rdzas shes rab dang thabs gnyis su med pa'i bsgrub bya nyid du bstan to/ /ji skad du/ /yi ge e ni shes rab ste/ /de bzhin wa ni thabs su bshad/ /thig le mi shigs de nyid de/ /de las 'gro ba

gsum po skyes/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /bsgrub bya goms pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sprul ba'i 'khor dang zhes bya ba smos te/ /dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'o/ /dngos po thams cad de las skyes pas na sprul pa ste lte ba'i gnas so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo

zhes bya ba ni/ /phung po dang khams la sogs pa mngon par gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu ste/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor khu ba'i tshul can snying ga'i gnas so/ /longs spyod kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /me'i dkyil 'khor te/ /dro ba nyid kyis rdzas swom pa la gnas pa'i ro drug gi longs spyod pa'i rgyur 'gyur

bas na longs spyod de/ /mgrin pa'i gnas so/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /g.yo ba dang 'gul ba la sogs pa'i rgyu yin pas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo spyi bo'i gnas zhes bya ba'i don to/ /ji skad du/ /sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang / /bde ba chen

po de bzhin te/ /skye gnas snying ga mgrin spyi bor/ /sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas/ /sems can ma lus pa rnams kyi/ /gang du skye ba rab tu brjod/ /de ni sprul ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan pa'i/ /chos ni sems kyi rang gzugs can/ /chos kyi sku ni snying

gar gnas/ /ro yi gzugs can drug rnams la/ /longs spyod pas na longs spyod bshad/ /mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo ste/ /bde ba chen po spyi bo nas/ /zhes rgyud kyi tshig 'di las nyan thos kyi sde ba 'dus par shes par bya'o/ /yang bshad pa/ /gzhi tsam gyi mngon par zhen pa

spangs te/ gzhi can rnams gtso bo nyid kyi 'khor lo nyid du// bshad par bya ste/ /de la sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ brjod du med pa'i yi ge a las/ /ngag gi 'gyur ba thams cad sprul pa'i 'khor lor sprul zhing skyes pa na yi ge e nyid sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /rgyu la 'bras bu'i

ming btags pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /de'i 'bras bur gyur pa phung po lnga'i tshig rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid can yi ge hUM bshad do/ /longs spyod kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan la dmigs par byed pa'i yi ge oM mo/ /yul can la

yul gyi ming btags pa'i phyir ro/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /rang rig pa'i bde ba chen po'i rgyur gyur pa/ mgo med mi shigs pa thur tu blta ba yi ge ha'o/ /de nyid khyab par byed pa yin pas na/ /'khor lor bstan te/ ji skad du/ 'khor lo shugs chen mkha' dbyings

zhes/ /yul la sogs pa rnam sbyong byed/ /ces dgyes pa'i rdo rje las 'byung ngo / /yang bshad pa/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab bo/ /sangs rgyas la sogs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid 'khor lor bstan te/ dmigs pa dang bcas

pa'i shes rab kyi phyogs su las kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa'i rnam par so sor snang ba'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ zhal dang phyag dang sku mdog dang dbyibs kyi bdag nyid he ru ka'i rnam pa yin te/ dngos po'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nyid 'khor lor

bstan pa ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /longs spyod kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms par zhugs pa las/ tha mal pa'i nga rgyal log pa las longs spyod pa ste/ /'khyud pa dang tsum+ba na la sogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa'o/ /de nyid mang bas na 'khor lor bshad do/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ /rol pa'i dus su man ngag gi rjes su 'brang ba las/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i bde ba chen po thob pa'o/ /rnam pa sna tshogs la khyab par byed pas na de nyid

'khor lor bshad do/ /ji skad du/ 'gro kun bde bas khyab pa yi/ /zhes 'byung ngo / /yang bshad pa ni/ sprul po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni/ pad+ma'i dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo'o/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la sogs pa lha mo'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi
